explosion.shortDesc: 攻击邻近的宝可梦。使用者陷入濒死状态。
explosion.name: 大爆炸
explosion.desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Ability Damp.

lowsweep.name: 下盘踢
lowsweep.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

magnitude.shortDesc: 攻击邻近的宝可梦。威力随机变化，对挖洞的目标造成两倍伤害。
magnitude.name: 震级
magnitude.desc: The power of this move varies; 5% chances for 10 and 150 power, 10% chances for 30 and 110 power, 20% chances for 50 and 90 power, and 30% chance for 70 power. Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.

bubblebeam.shortDesc: 有10%的几率使目标的速度下降一级。
bubblebeam.name: 泡沫光线
bubblebeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

aeroblast.name: 气旋攻击
aeroblast.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

crunch.name: 咬碎
crunch.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

petaldance.shortDesc: 持续2-3回合，冷静下来后会混乱。
petaldance.name: 花瓣舞
petaldance.desc: Deals damage to one adjacent foe at random. The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused after the last turn of the effect if it is not already. If the user is prevented from moving or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.

holdback.shortDesc: 总会使目标留下至少一点HP。
holdback.name: 手下留情
holdback.desc: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.

gyroball.shortDesc: 使用者速度比对手越慢，威力越大。
gyroball.name: 陀螺球
gyroball.desc: Power is equal to (25 * target's current Speed / user's current Speed), rounded down, + 1, but not more than 150.

babydolleyes.shortDesc: 使对手的攻击下降一级。
babydolleyes.name: 圆瞳
babydolleyes.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.

crosspoison.shortDesc: 容易击中要害。有10%的几率使对手中毒。
crosspoison.name: 十字毒刃
crosspoison.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.

headbutt.shortDesc: 有30%的几率使目标陷入畏缩状态。
headbutt.name: 头锤
headbutt.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

anchorshot.name: 掷锚
anchorshot.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.

sharpen.shortDesc: 使使用者的攻击上升一级。
sharpen.name: 棱角化
sharpen.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.

skyuppercut.shortDesc: 可以击中使用弹跳，飞空，自由落体的宝可梦。
skyuppercut.name: 冲天拳
skyuppercut.desc: This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop.

dreameater.shortDesc: 使用者将攻击造成伤害的1/2转化为自身的HP。只对睡眠状态的宝可梦有效。
dreameater.name: 食梦
dreameater.desc: The target is unaffected by this move unless it is asleep. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

beakblast.shortDesc: 在使用技能前接触到使用者的对手会陷入烧伤状态。
beakblast.name: 鸟嘴加农炮
beakblast.desc: If the user is hit by a contact move this turn before it can execute this move, the attacker is burned.

dizzypunch.shortDesc: 有20%的几率使目标陷入混乱状态。
dizzypunch.name: 迷昏拳
dizzypunch.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

trickortreat.name: 万圣夜
trickortreat.desc: Causes the Ghost type to be added to the target, effectively making it have two or three types. Fails if the target is already a Ghost type. If Forest's Curse adds a type to the target, it replaces the type added by this move and vice versa.

astonish.shortDesc: 有30%的几率使目标陷入畏缩状态。
astonish.name: 惊吓
astonish.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

conversion2.shortDesc: 使自己的属性变的对目标最后使出的招式属性有抗性。
conversion2.name: 纹理２
conversion2.desc: The user's type changes to match a type that resists or is immune to the type of the last move used by the target, but not either of its current types. The determined type of the move is used rather than the original type. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user cannot change its type, or if this move would only be able to select one of the user's current types.

geomancy.shortDesc: 先充能，然后提升使用者的特攻特防速度各两级。
geomancy.name: 大地掌控
geomancy.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

milkdrink.shortDesc: 使使用者回复自身最大HP的50%。
milkdrink.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
milkdrink.name: 喝牛奶

quickattack.shortDesc: 一定能先发制人进行攻击。
quickattack.name: 电光一闪

purify.shortDesc: 治愈目标的异常状态，恢复使用者最大HP的50%如果治愈成功。
purify.name: 净化
purify.desc: The target is cured if it has a major status condition. If the target was cured, the user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.

kingsshield.shortDesc: Protects from attacks. Contact try: lowers Atk by 2.
kingsshield.name: 王者盾牌
kingsshield.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Attack lowered by 2 stages. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

disarmingvoice.shortDesc: 攻击一定会命中。攻击所有对手。
disarmingvoice.name: 魅惑之声
disarmingvoice.desc: This move does not check accuracy.

quiverdance.shortDesc: 提升使用者的特攻特防速度各一级。
quiverdance.name: 蝶舞
quiverdance.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.

guardianofalola.name: 巨人卫士-阿罗拉
guardianofalola.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to 3/4 of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.

iondeluge.shortDesc: 使得该回合场上的普通系技能变为电系。
iondeluge.name: 等离子浴
iondeluge.desc: Causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn.

morningsun.shortDesc: 恢复使用者的HP，回复量随天气变化。
morningsun.name: 晨光
morningsun.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down.

frustration.shortDesc: 当亲密值最低的时候达到最大威力102。
frustration.name: 迁怒
frustration.desc: Power is equal to the greater of ((255 - user's Happiness) * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

flamethrower.shortDesc: 有10%的几率使目标陷入烧伤状态。
flamethrower.name: 喷射火焰
flamethrower.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

brine.shortDesc: 如果对手的HP为最大HP的一半或更少，此技能威力翻倍。
brine.name: 盐水
brine.desc: Power doubles if the target has less than or equal to half of its maximum HP remaining.

drainpunch.shortDesc: 使用者将造成伤害的50%转化为自身的HP。
drainpunch.name: 吸取拳
drainpunch.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

megadrain.shortDesc: 使用者将造成伤害的50%转化为自身的HP。
megadrain.name: 超级吸取
megadrain.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

overheat.shortDesc: 使使用者的特攻下降两级。
overheat.name: 过热
overheat.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.

payback.shortDesc: 如果在目标之后攻击，威力翻倍。
payback.name: 以牙还牙
payback.desc: Power doubles if the target moves before the user; power is not doubled if the target switches out.

sludge.name: 污泥攻击
sludge.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

assist.shortDesc: 随机使用队伍里一个成员已习得的技能。
assist.name: 借助
assist.desc: A random move among those known by the user's party members is selected for use. Does not select Assist, Belch, Bestow, Bounce, Chatter, Circle Throw, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Dig, Dive, Dragon Tail, Endure, Feint, Fly, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, King's Shield, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Phantom Force, Protect, Rage Powder, Roar, Shadow Force, Sketch, Sky Drop, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Spiky Shield, Struggle, Switcheroo, Thief, Transform, Trick, or Whirlwind.

swordsdance.shortDesc: 使使用者的攻击提升两级。
swordsdance.name: 剑舞
swordsdance.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 2 stages.

hex.shortDesc: 如果目标已经陷入负面状态则威力翻倍。
hex.name: 祸不单行
hex.desc: Power doubles if the target has a major status condition.

steelwing.name: 钢翼
steelwing.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage.

darkestlariat.shortDesc: 无视目标的能力等级变化进行攻击。
darkestlariat.name: ＤＤ金勾臂
darkestlariat.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.

closecombat.shortDesc: 使使用者的防御和特防下降一级。
closecombat.name: 近身战
closecombat.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.

rollout.shortDesc: 每一次攻击威力都会翻倍，连续攻击5次。
rollout.name: 滚动
rollout.desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.

ominouswind.shortDesc: 有10%的几率提升自身各项能力一级（除回避率，命中率）
ominouswind.name: 奇异之风
ominouswind.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.

memento.shortDesc: 使目标的攻击和特攻下降两级，使用者陷入濒死状态。
memento.name: 临别礼物
memento.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. The user faints unless this move misses or there is no target. Fails entirely if this move hits a substitute, but does not fail if the target's stats cannot be changed.

nightslash.name: 暗袭要害
nightslash.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

rockpolish.shortDesc: 令使用者的速度提升2级。
rockpolish.name: 岩石打磨
rockpolish.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.

healbell.shortDesc: 治愈使用者队伍中所有宝可梦的异常状态。
healbell.name: 治愈铃声
healbell.desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its major status condition. Active Pokemon with the Ability Soundproof are not cured.

iceball.shortDesc: 每一次攻击威力都会翻倍，连续攻击5次。
iceball.name: 冰球
iceball.desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.

zingzap.shortDesc: 有30%的几率使目标陷入畏缩状态。
zingzap.name: 麻麻刺刺
zingzap.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

secretsword.shortDesc: 计算伤害时按防守方的防御计算，不是特防。
secretsword.name: 神秘之剑
secretsword.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.

aurasphere.name: 波导弹
aurasphere.desc: This move does not check accuracy.

craftyshield.shortDesc: 保护所有同伴免收变化技能的影响。
craftyshield.name: 戏法防守
craftyshield.desc: The user and its party members are protected from non-damaging attacks made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.

destinybond.shortDesc: 如果对手使使用者陷入濒死状态，那么该对手同样也陷入濒死状态。
destinybond.name: 同命
destinybond.desc: Until the user's next turn, if a foe's attack knocks the user out, that foe faints as well, unless the attack was Doom Desire or Future Sight.

plasmafists.shortDesc: 使得该回合场上的普通系技能变为电系。
plasmafists.name: 等离子闪电拳
plasmafists.desc: Causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn.

helpinghand.shortDesc: 一名邻近的同伴此回合使出的技能威力变为原来的1.5倍。
helpinghand.name: 帮助
helpinghand.desc: The power of the target's attack this turn is multiplied by 1.5 (this effect is stackable). Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user, but does not fail if the ally is using a two-turn move.

poisonfang.name: 剧毒牙
poisonfang.desc: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.

glaciate.shortDesc: 100%使(所有)对手的速度下降一级。
glaciate.name: 冰封世界
glaciate.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

bugbuzz.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def. by 1.
bugbuzz.name: 虫鸣
bugbuzz.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

focusenergy.shortDesc: 使使用者的会心一击等级提升两级。
focusenergy.name: 聚气
focusenergy.desc: Raises the user's chance for a critical hit by 2 stages. Fails if the user already has the effect. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.

thunderfang.name: 雷电牙
thunderfang.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a 10% chance to flinch it.

return.shortDesc: 当亲密值最高的时候达到最大威力102。
return.name: 报恩
return.desc: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

mindreader.shortDesc: 使用者下一回合对目标的攻击将不会被回避。
mindreader.name: 心之眼
mindreader.desc: On the following turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. Fails if the user used this move successfully last turn and that target is still active.

magicalleaf.name: 魔法叶
magicalleaf.desc: This move does not check accuracy.

workup.shortDesc: 提升使用者的攻击特攻各一级。
workup.name: 自我激励
workup.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.

secretpower.shortDesc: 效果随场地变化（默认30%麻痹几率）。
secretpower.name: 秘密之力
secretpower.desc: Has a 30% chance to cause a secondary effect on the target based on the battle terrain. Causes paralysis on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, causes paralysis during Electric Terrain, lowers Special Attack by 1 stage during Misty Terrain, causes sleep during Grassy Terrain and lowers Speed by 1 stage during Psychic Terrain. The secondary effect chance is not affected by the Ability Serene Grace.

toxicthread.shortDesc: 使目标速度下降一级并且中毒。
toxicthread.name: 毒丝
toxicthread.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 stage and poisons it.

aquaring.shortDesc: 使用者每回合回复自身最大HP的1/16。
aquaring.name: 水流环
aquaring.desc: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, restored at the end of each turn while it remains active. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will receive the healing effect.

scald.shortDesc: 30%使目标陷入烧伤状态。能使使用者解除冰冻状态。
scald.name: 热水
scald.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.

drillrun.name: 直冲钻
drillrun.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

circlethrow.shortDesc: 使目标和后备精灵替换。
circlethrow.name: 巴投
circlethrow.desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. This effect fails if the target used Ingrain previously, has the Ability Suction Cups, or this move hit a substitute.

encore.shortDesc: 目标将在三回合内重复使用其最后使用过的技能。
encore.name: 再来一次
encore.desc: For 3 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used. If the affected move runs out of PP, the effect ends. Fails if the target is already under this effect, if it has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if the move is Encore, Mimic, Mirror Move, Sketch, Struggle, or Transform.

banefulbunker.shortDesc: 使自己进入守住状态，接触到的对手会陷入中毒状态。
banefulbunker.name: 碉堡
banefulbunker.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon making contact with the user become poisoned. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

multiattack.shortDesc: 技能属性和携带的储存碟有关。
multiattack.name: 多属性攻击
multiattack.desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Memory.

magmastorm.name: 熔岩风暴
magmastorm.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns; seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.

moonblast.name: 月亮之力
moonblast.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.

boomburst.shortDesc: 攻击目标造成伤害。攻击邻近的宝可梦。
boomburst.name: 爆音波

bravebird.name: 勇鸟猛攻
bravebird.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

flyingpress.shortDesc: 此技能同时也具备飞行属性。
flyingpress.name: 飞身重压
flyingpress.desc: This move combines Flying in its type effectiveness against the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.

infestation.name: 死缠烂打
infestation.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns; seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.

waterfall.name: 攀瀑
waterfall.desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target.

iciclespear.name: 冰锥
iciclespear.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

camouflage.shortDesc: 根据场地改变使用者的属性。
camouflage.name: 保护色
camouflage.desc: The user's type changes based on the battle terrain. Normal type on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, Electric type during Electric Terrain, Fairy type during Misty Terrain, Grass type during Grassy Terrain, and Psychic type during Psychic Terrain. Fails if the user's type cannot be changed or if the user is already purely that type.

wringout.shortDesc: 目标剩余的HP越多，此技能威力越高。
wringout.name: 绞紧
wringout.desc: Power is equal to 120 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP), rounded half down, but not less than 1.

sandattack.shortDesc: 使目标的命中率下降一级。
sandattack.name: 泼沙
sandattack.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

stompingtantrum.shortDesc: 如果使用者的上一次攻击使用失败，这此技能威力翻倍。
stompingtantrum.name: 跺脚
stompingtantrum.desc: Power doubles if the user's last move failed.

muddywater.name: 浊流
muddywater.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

menacingmoonrazemaelstrom.shortDesc: 无视目标的特性进行攻击。
menacingmoonrazemaelstrom.name: 月华飞溅落灵霄
menacingmoonrazemaelstrom.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

bestow.shortDesc: 使用者将持有的道具移交给目标。
bestow.name: 传递礼物
bestow.desc: The target receives the user's held item. Fails if the user has no item or is holding a Mail, if the target is already holding an item, if the user is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species, or if the target is one of those Pokemon and the user is holding the respective item.

naturesmadness.shortDesc: 攻击造成的伤害为目标剩下HP的50%。
naturesmadness.name: 自然之怒
naturesmadness.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.

superpower.shortDesc: 降低使用者的攻击和防御各一级。
superpower.name: 蛮力
superpower.desc: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.

shadowbone.name: 暗影之骨
shadowbone.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

spiderweb.shortDesc: 目标将无法替换其它精灵上场
spiderweb.name: 蛛网
spiderweb.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.

constrict.shortDesc: 有10%的几率使目标的速度下降一级。
constrict.name: 缠绕
constrict.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

guardsplit.shortDesc: 平分使用者和目标的防御和特防。
guardsplit.name: 防御平分
guardsplit.desc: The user and the target have their Defense and Special Defense stats set to be equal to the average of the user and the target's Defense and Special Defense stats, respectively, rounded down. Stat stage changes are unaffected.

stealthrock.shortDesc: 伤害交换出的站在地面上的对手，计算岩石属性相克。
stealthrock.name: 隐形岩
stealthrock.desc: Sets up a hazard on the foe's side of the field, damaging each foe that switches in. Can be used only once before failing. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the foe's side if any foe uses Rapid Spin or Defog, or is hit by Defog.

healblock.shortDesc: 5回合内，（所有）对手无法使用治愈技能。
healblock.name: 回复封锁
healblock.desc: For 5 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Ability Regenerator are unaffected.

retaliate.shortDesc: 如果上一回合有同伴倒下，技能威力翻倍。
retaliate.name: 报仇
retaliate.desc: Power doubles if one of the user's party members fainted last turn.

chargebeam.shortDesc: 有70%的几率使使用者的特攻上升一级。
chargebeam.name: 充电光束
chargebeam.desc: Has a 70% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.

floralhealing.name: 花疗
floralhealing.desc: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the terrain is Grassy Terrain, the target instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.

covet.shortDesc: 如果使用者没有持有道具，将会偷走目标的道具。
covet.name: 渴望
covet.desc: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail, or if the target is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, or a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Ability Harvest.

dragonbreath.shortDesc: 有30%的几率使对手陷入麻痹状态。
dragonbreath.name: 龙息
dragonbreath.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

matblock.shortDesc: 防止同伴受到攻击，只能在出场后第一回合使用。
matblock.name: 掀榻榻米
matblock.desc: The user and its party members are protected from damaging attacks made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field, if the user moves last this turn, or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.

barrier.shortDesc: 令使用者的防御提升2级。
barrier.name: 屏障
barrier.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

frostbreath.name: 冰息
frostbreath.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Abilities Battle Armor or Shell Armor.

mudshot.name: 泥巴射击
mudshot.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

diamondstorm.shortDesc: 每一次攻击都有50%的几率使使用者的防御提升两级。
diamondstorm.name: 钻石风暴
diamondstorm.desc: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Defense by 2 stages.

shadowstrike.shortDesc: 有50%的几率使对手的防御下降一级。
shadowstrike.name: Shadow Strike
shadowstrike.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

mist.shortDesc: 在５回合内不会让对手降低自己队伍中宝可梦的能力。
mist.name: 白雾
mist.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members are protected from having their stats lowered by other Pokemon.

judgment.shortDesc: 技能的属性会根据所持有的石板变化。
judgment.name: 制裁光砾
judgment.desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Plate.

paleowave.name: Paleo Wave
paleowave.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.

speedswap.name: 速度互换
speedswap.desc: The user swaps its raw Speed stat with the target.

taunt.shortDesc: 三回合内目标将无法使用变化技能。
taunt.name: 挑衅
taunt.desc: Prevents the target from using non-damaging moves for its next three turns. Pokemon with the Ability Oblivious or protected by the Ability Aroma Veil are immune.

copycat.shortDesc: 使用上一个在对战中使用的招式。
copycat.name: 仿效
copycat.desc: The user uses the last move used by any Pokemon, including itself. Fails if no move has been used, or if the last move used was Assist, Belch, Bestow, Chatter, Circle Throw, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Dragon Tail, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, King's Shield, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Protect, Rage Powder, Roar, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Spiky Shield, Struggle, Switcheroo, Thief, Transform, Trick, or Whirlwind.

bind.name: 绑紧
bind.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns; seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.

metalclaw.name: 金属爪
metalclaw.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.

stockpile.shortDesc: 提升使用者的防御和特防各一级。最多累积三次。
stockpile.name: 蓄力
stockpile.desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. The user's Stockpile count increases by 1. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 3.

snatch.shortDesc: 使用者窃取目标的有益技能化为己用。
snatch.name: 抢夺
snatch.desc: If another Pokemon uses one of the following moves this turn, the user steals that move to use itself. If multiple Pokemon use this move in the same turn, the applicable moves will be stolen in turn order; a move cannot be stolen multiple times. Aqua Ring, Aromatherapy, Autotomize, Belly Drum, Camouflage, Charge, Conversion, Cosmic Power, Cotton Guard, Heal Bell, Healing Wish, Imprison, Ingrain, Light Screen, Lucky Chant, Lunar Dance, Magnet Rise, Mist, Power Trick, Quick Guard, Recycle, Reflect, Refresh, Safeguard, Stockpile, Substitute, Swallow, Tailwind, Wide Guard, Wish, and any move that has a primary effect of raising the user's stats or healing the user.

quickguard.shortDesc: 保护同伴免收先制技能攻击。
quickguard.name: 快速防守
quickguard.desc: The user and its party members are protected from attacks with original or altered priority greater than 0 made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.

heartstamp.shortDesc: 有30%的几率使目标陷入畏缩状态。
heartstamp.name: 爱心印章
heartstamp.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

leafblade.name: 叶刃
leafblade.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

shoreup.shortDesc: 恢复使用者的HP，回复量随天气变化。
shoreup.name: 集沙
shoreup.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the weather is Sandstorm, the user instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.

metalburst.shortDesc: 如果因攻击而受到伤害，则返还1.5倍的伤害。
metalburst.name: 金属爆炸
metalburst.desc: Deals damage to the last foe to hit the user with an attack this turn equal to 1.5 times the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals damage with a Base Power of 1 instead. If that foe's position is no longer in use, the damage is done to a random foe in range. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by a foe's attack this turn.

rockwrecker.shortDesc: 使用者下回合无法移动
rockwrecker.name: 岩石炮
rockwrecker.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.

playnice.shortDesc: 使对手的攻击下降一级。
playnice.name: 和睦相处
playnice.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.

volttackle.shortDesc: 有33%的反弹伤害，10%使目标陷入麻痹状态。
volttackle.name: 伏特攻击
volttackle.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

powerswap.shortDesc: 交换使用者和目标的基础攻击和特攻能力值。
powerswap.name: 力量互换
powerswap.desc: The user swaps its Attack and Special Attack stat stage changes with the target.

photongeyser.shortDesc: Uses higher attacking stat in damage calculation.
photongeyser.name: 光子喷涌
photongeyser.desc: Damage is calculated using the user's higher attacking stat, including stat stage changes. The user's Ability, item, and burn are used as normal.

icywind.shortDesc: 100%使(所有)对手的速度下降一级。
icywind.name: 冰冻之风
icywind.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

leafstorm.shortDesc: 使使用者的特攻下降两级。
leafstorm.name: 飞叶风暴
leafstorm.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.

sunsteelstrike.shortDesc: 无视目标的特性进行攻击。
sunsteelstrike.name: 流星闪冲
sunsteelstrike.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

fusionflare.shortDesc: 如果在攻击前被交织闪电击中的话威力加倍。
fusionflare.name: 交错火焰
fusionflare.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Bolt.

counter.shortDesc: 如果被物理攻击伤害，则返还对手两倍的伤害。
counter.name: 双倍奉还
counter.desc: Deals damage to the last foe to hit the user with a physical attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals damage with a Base Power of 1 instead. If that foe's position is no longer in use, the damage is done to a random foe in range. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by a foe's physical attack this turn.

magnetrise.shortDesc: 5回合内，使用者免受地上系技能的攻击。
magnetrise.name: 电磁漂浮
magnetrise.desc: For 5 turns, the user is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Ability Arena Trap as long as it remains active. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball override this move if the user is under any of their effects. Fails if the user is already under this effect or the effects of Ingrain, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.

razorwind.shortDesc: 充能，第二回合攻击（所有）对手。容易造成会心一击。
razorwind.name: 旋风刀
razorwind.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

defendorder.shortDesc: 提升使用者的防御和特防各一级。
defendorder.name: 防御指令
defendorder.desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.

crosschop.name: 十字劈
crosschop.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

present.shortDesc: 40,80,120点威力，或者恢复对手最大HP的1/4.
present.name: 礼物
present.desc: Deals damage or heals the target. 40% chance for 40 power, 30% chance for 80 power, 10% chance for 120 power, and 20% chance to heal the target by 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down. This move must hit to be effective.

grasswhistle.name: 草笛
grasswhistle.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

jumpkick.shortDesc: 如果技能未命中则使用者失去最大HP的50%。
jumpkick.name: 飞踢
jumpkick.desc: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Ability Magic Guard are unaffected by crash damage.

nobleroar.shortDesc: 降低目标的攻击和特攻一级。
nobleroar.name: 战吼
nobleroar.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.

flowershield.shortDesc: 使场上所有草系宝可梦的防御提升一级。
flowershield.name: 鲜花防守
flowershield.desc: Raises the Defense of all Grass-type Pokemon on the field by 1 stage.

pinmissile.name: 导弹针
pinmissile.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

spacialrend.name: 亚空裂斩
spacialrend.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

acid.name: 溶解液
acid.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

searingshot.shortDesc: 30%使邻近的宝可梦陷入烧伤状态。
searingshot.name: 火焰弹
searingshot.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

psywave.name: 精神波
psywave.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (user's level) * (X+50) / 100, where X is a random number from 0 to 100, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.

dracometeor.shortDesc: 使使用者的特攻下降两级。
dracometeor.name: 流星群
dracometeor.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.

doomdesire.shortDesc: 使用该技能后，两回合后触发攻击效果。
doomdesire.name: 破灭之愿
doomdesire.desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Future Sight is already in effect for the target's position.

spitup.shortDesc: 能量积蓄得越多，威力越大。
spitup.name: 喷出
spitup.desc: Power is equal to 100 times the user's Stockpile count. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. Whether or not this move is successful, the user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.

paraboliccharge.shortDesc: 使用者将造成伤害的50%转化为自身的HP。
paraboliccharge.name: 抛物面充电
paraboliccharge.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

mudbomb.name: 泥巴炸弹
mudbomb.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

chatter.name: 喋喋不休
chatter.desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

bonemerang.name: 骨头回力镖
bonemerang.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

wonderroom.shortDesc: 5回合内所有防御和特防基础值交换。
wonderroom.name: 奇妙空间
wonderroom.desc: For 5 turns, all active Pokemon have their Defense and Special Defense stats swapped. Stat stage changes are unaffected. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.

sweetkiss.name: 天使之吻
sweetkiss.desc: Causes the target to become confused.

electroball.shortDesc: 使用者比目标速度越快，此技能威力越高。
electroball.name: 电球
electroball.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's current Speed / target's current Speed), rounded down. Power is equal to 150 if the result is 4 or more, 120 if 3, 80 if 2, 60 if 1, 40 if less than 1.

hiddenpower.shortDesc: 技能属性和使用者的个体值有关。
hiddenpower.name: 觉醒力量
hiddenpower.desc: This move's type depends on the user's individual values (IVs), and can be any type but Fairy and Normal.

precipiceblades.shortDesc: 攻击目标造成伤害。攻击邻近的宝可梦。
precipiceblades.name: 断崖之剑

roaroftime.shortDesc: 使用者下回合无法移动
roaroftime.name: 时光咆哮
roaroftime.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.

kinesis.shortDesc: 使目标的命中率下降一级。
kinesis.name: 折弯汤匙
kinesis.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

shadowsneak.shortDesc: 一定能先发制人进行攻击。
shadowsneak.name: 影子偷袭

rapidspin.shortDesc: 消除自身的寄生种子，摆脱束缚状态，并清除己方场地的撒菱、隐形岩、毒菱和黏黏网。
rapidspin.name: 高速旋转
rapidspin.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and partial-trapping moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field.

metalsound.shortDesc: 使目标的特防下降两级。
metalsound.name: 金属音
metalsound.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.

clangingscales.shortDesc: 使目标的防御下降一级。
clangingscales.name: 鳞片噪音
clangingscales.desc: Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage.

rockslide.name: 岩崩
rockslide.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

woodhammer.name: 木槌
woodhammer.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

guardswap.shortDesc: 交换使用者和目标的防御和特防。
guardswap.name: 防御互换
guardswap.desc: The user swaps its Defense and Special Defense stat stage changes with the target.

firelash.name: 火焰鞭
firelash.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

smellingsalts.shortDesc: 如果目标处于麻痹状态，威力翻倍，然后治愈其麻痹状态。
smellingsalts.name: 清醒
smellingsalts.desc: Power doubles if the target is paralyzed. If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of paralysis.

fakeout.shortDesc: 先制攻击，只能在出场后第一回合使用，100%使目标畏缩。
fakeout.name: 击掌奇袭
fakeout.desc: Has a 100% chance to flinch the target. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.

slash.name: 劈开
slash.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

healingwish.shortDesc: 使用者陷入濒死状态。替换上场的宝可梦会被完全治愈。
healingwish.name: 治愈之愿
healingwish.desc: The user faints and the Pokemon brought out to replace it has its HP fully restored along with having any major status condition cured. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.

switcheroo.shortDesc: 使用者和目标交换道具。
switcheroo.name: 掉包
switcheroo.desc: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, or a Drive to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, or a Genesect, respectively. Pokemon with the Ability Sticky Hold are immune.

lunardance.shortDesc: 使用者陷入濒死状态。替换上场的宝可梦会被完全治愈。包括回复PP。
lunardance.name: 新月舞
lunardance.desc: The user faints and the Pokemon brought out to replace it has its HP and PP fully restored along with having any major status condition cured. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.

stomp.shortDesc: 有30%的几率使目标陷入畏缩状态。
stomp.name: 踩踏
stomp.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.

shadowclaw.name: 阴影爪
shadowclaw.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

mysticalfire.name: 魔法火焰
mysticalfire.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.

watersport.shortDesc: 3回合内，火属性攻击威力为原来的1/3。
watersport.name: 玩水
watersport.desc: For 5 turns, all Fire-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power reduced to 0.33x. Fails if this move is already in effect.

shellsmash.shortDesc: 降低使用者的防御特防一级，提升使用者的攻击特攻速度各两级。
shellsmash.name: 破壳
shellsmash.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages.

discharge.shortDesc: 有30%的几率使邻近的宝可梦陷入麻痹状态。
discharge.name: 放电
discharge.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

selfdestruct.shortDesc: 攻击邻近的宝可梦。使用者陷入濒死状态。
selfdestruct.name: 自爆
selfdestruct.desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Ability Damp.

tropkick.name: 热带踢
tropkick.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.

gearup.shortDesc: 提升特性为正电/负电的宝可梦的攻击和特攻各一级。
gearup.name: 辅助齿轮
gearup.desc: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of Pokemon on the user's side with the Abilities Plus or Minus by 1 stage.

healpulse.name: 治愈波动
healpulse.desc: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user has the Ability Mega Launcher, the target instead restores 3/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.

heatwave.name: 热风
heatwave.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

iceburn.shortDesc: 第一回合充能，第二回合攻击。有30%的几率使对手陷入烧伤状态。
iceburn.name: 极寒冷焰
iceburn.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

earthpower.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def. by 1.
earthpower.name: 大地之力
earthpower.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

sacredsword.shortDesc: 无视目标的能力等级变化进行攻击。
sacredsword.name: 圣剑
sacredsword.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.

hyperspacefury.shortDesc: 胡帕-解放：降低使用者的防御一级；破坏对手的守住状态。
hyperspacefury.name: 异次元猛攻
hyperspacefury.desc: Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Hoopa Unbound. If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.

vacuumwave.shortDesc: 一定能先发制人进行攻击。
vacuumwave.name: 真空波

laserfocus.shortDesc: 下一回合一定会打出会心一击。
laserfocus.name: 磨砺
laserfocus.desc: On the next turn, the user's attack will be a critical hit. Fails if the user already has the effect.

detect.shortDesc: 本回合内，避免技能对使用者造成影响。
detect.name: 看穿
detect.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

pursuit.shortDesc: 如果对手替换精灵，威力为原来的两倍。
pursuit.name: 追打
pursuit.desc: If an adjacent foe switches out this turn, this move hits that Pokemon before it leaves the field, even if it was not the original target. If the user moves after a foe using Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch, but not Baton Pass, it will hit that foe before it leaves the field. Power doubles and no accuracy check is done if the user hits a foe switching out, and the user's turn is over; if a foe faints from this, the replacement Pokemon does not become active until the end of the turn.

dragontail.shortDesc: 使目标和后备精灵替换。
dragontail.name: 龙尾
dragontail.desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. This effect fails if the target used Ingrain previously, has the Ability Suction Cups, or this move hit a substitute.

weatherball.shortDesc: 有天气时技能威力会翻倍，属性会变化。
weatherball.name: 气象球
weatherball.desc: Power doubles during weather effects and this move's type changes to match; Ice type during Hail, Water type during Rain Dance, Rock type during Sandstorm, and Fire type during Sunny Day.

fierydance.shortDesc: 有50%的几率使使用者的特攻上升一级。
fierydance.name: 火之舞
fierydance.desc: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.

magicroom.shortDesc: 5回合内，携带的道具将不会有效果。
magicroom.name: 魔法空间
magicroom.desc: For 5 turns, the held items of all active Pokemon have no effect. An item's effect of causing forme changes is unaffected, but any other effects from such items are negated. During the effect, Fling and Natural Gift are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.

bellydrum.shortDesc: 使用者失去自身最大HP的50%，使攻击最大化。
bellydrum.name: 腹鼓
bellydrum.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 12 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack stat stage is 6.

instruct.shortDesc: 目标会立即使用其上次使用的技能。
instruct.name: 号令
instruct.desc: The target immediately uses its last used move. Fails if the target has not made a move, or if the move is...

agility.shortDesc: 令使用者的速度提升2级。
agility.name: 高速移动
agility.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.

grasspledge.shortDesc: 和火或水之誓言同时使用会有特效。
grasspledge.name: 草之誓约
grasspledge.desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Fire Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Fire Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 Base Power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Grass Pledge with 150 Base Power and a swamp appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which quarters the Speed of each Pokemon on that side. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Grass Gem.

electroweb.shortDesc: 100%使(所有)对手的速度下降一级。
electroweb.name: 电网
electroweb.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

freezedry.shortDesc: 有10%的几率使对手陷入冰冻状态。对水系效果拔群。
freezedry.name: 冷冻干燥
freezedry.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. This move's type effectiveness against Water is changed to be super effective no matter what this move's type is.

uturn.shortDesc: 使用者在攻击目标后会替换后备精灵上场。
uturn.name: 极速折返
uturn.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button.

leechseed.shortDesc: 每回合吸取目标最大生命值的1/8。
leechseed.name: 寄生种子
leechseed.desc: The Pokemon at the user's position steals 1/8 of the target's maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. If Big Root is held by the recipient, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue being leeched. If the target switches out or uses Rapid Spin, the effect ends. Grass-type Pokemon are immune to this move on use, but not its effect.

avalanche.shortDesc: 如果被对手攻击的话，威力翻倍。
avalanche.name: 雪崩
avalanche.desc: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn.

razorshell.shortDesc: 有50%的几率使对手的防御下降一级。
razorshell.name: 贝壳刃
razorshell.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

ancientpower.shortDesc: 有10%的几率提升自身各项能力一级（除回避率，命中率）
ancientpower.name: 原始力量
ancientpower.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.

round.shortDesc: 如果有其他宝可梦在这一回合使用了合唱，技能威力翻倍。
round.name: 轮唱
round.desc: If there are other active Pokemon that chose this move for use this turn, those Pokemon take their turn immediately after the user, in Speed order, and this move's power is 120 for each other user.

thief.shortDesc: 如果使用者没有持有道具，将会偷走目标的道具。
thief.name: 小偷
thief.desc: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail, or if the target is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, or a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Ability Harvest.

facade.shortDesc: 如果使用者处于烧伤/中毒/麻痹状态，技能威力为原来的两倍。
facade.name: 硬撑
facade.desc: Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. The physical damage halving effect from the user's burn is ignored.

leaftornado.name: 青草搅拌器
leaftornado.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

ragepowder.shortDesc: 所有对方使用的作用范围为单体选择的招式都会攻向自己。
ragepowder.name: 愤怒粉
ragepowder.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the foe's team are redirected to the user if they are in range. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Ability Magic Bounce, or drawn in by the Abilities Lightning Rod or Storm Drain. Fails if it is not a Double or Triple Battle.

growth.shortDesc: 使使用者的攻击和特攻上升一级，晴天上升两级。
growth.name: 生长
growth.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If the weather is Sunny Day, raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages.

playrough.name: 嬉闹
playrough.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.

searingsunrazesmash.shortDesc: 无视目标的特性进行攻击。
searingsunrazesmash.name: 日光回旋下苍穹
searingsunrazesmash.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

clearsmog.shortDesc: 消除目标的所有能力等级变化。
clearsmog.name: 清除之烟
clearsmog.desc: Resets all of the target's stat stages to 0.

fairylock.shortDesc: 下一回合内，阻止所有宝可梦的替换。
fairylock.name: 妖精之锁
fairylock.desc: Prevents all active Pokemon from switching next turn. A Pokemon can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. Fails if this move was used successfully last turn.

earthquake.shortDesc: 攻击邻近的宝可梦。如果有目标处于挖洞你状态则对其威力翻倍。
earthquake.name: 地震
earthquake.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.

foulplay.shortDesc: 使用目标的攻击代替使用者的攻击进行伤害计算。
foulplay.name: 欺诈
foulplay.desc: Damage is calculated using the target's Attack stat, including stat stage changes. The user's Ability, item, and burn are used as normal.

firespin.name: 火焰旋涡
firespin.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns; seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.

leer.shortDesc: 使（所有）对手的防御下降一级。
leer.name: 瞪眼
leer.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.

petalblizzard.shortDesc: 攻击目标造成伤害。攻击邻近的宝可梦。
petalblizzard.name: 落英缤纷

firefang.shortDesc: 有10%的几率使目标陷入烧伤状态。有10%的几率使目标畏缩。
firefang.name: 火焰牙
firefang.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to flinch it.

swagger.shortDesc: 提升目标的攻击两级且使其混乱。
swagger.name: 虚张声势
swagger.desc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 stages and confuses it.

powertrick.shortDesc: 交换使用者的攻击和防御基础能力值。
powertrick.name: 力量戏法
powertrick.desc: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats; stat stage changes remain on their respective stats. This move can be used again to swap the stats back. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will have its Attack and Defense stats swapped if the effect is active. If the user has its stats recalculated by changing forme while its stats are swapped, this effect is ignored but is still active for the purposes of Baton Pass.

moongeistbeam.shortDesc: 无视目标的特性进行攻击。
moongeistbeam.name: 暗影之光
moongeistbeam.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

wrap.name: 紧束
wrap.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns; seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.

uproar.shortDesc: 持续3回合，在场上的宝可梦不会陷入睡眠状态。
uproar.name: 吵闹
uproar.desc: Deals damage to one adjacent foe at random. The user spends three turns locked into this move. On the first of the three turns, all sleeping active Pokemon wake up. During the three turns, no active Pokemon can fall asleep by any means; Pokemon switched in during the effect do not wake up. If the user is prevented from moving or the attack is not successful against the target during one of the turns, the effect ends.

rollingkick.shortDesc: 有30%的几率使目标陷入畏缩状态。
rollingkick.name: 回旋踢
rollingkick.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

sketch.shortDesc: 抄袭目标最后使用的技能。
sketch.name: 写生
sketch.desc: This move is permanently replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has the maximum PP for that move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, or if the move is Chatter, Sketch, Struggle, or any move the user knows.

psystrike.shortDesc: 计算伤害时按防守方的防御计算，不是特防。
psystrike.name: 精神击破
psystrike.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.

protect.shortDesc: 本回合内，避免技能对使用者造成影响。
protect.name: 守住
protect.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

withdraw.shortDesc: 使使用者的防御提升一级。
withdraw.name: 缩入壳中
withdraw.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.

meteormash.name: 彗星拳
meteormash.desc: Has a 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.

magnetbomb.name: 磁铁炸弹
magnetbomb.desc: This move does not check accuracy.

mudsport.shortDesc: 五回合内，电系技能的威力变为原来的1/3。
mudsport.name: 玩泥巴
mudsport.desc: For 5 turns, all Electric-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power reduced to 0.33x. Fails if this move is already in effect.

vcreate.shortDesc: 降低使用者的防御特防和速度各一级。
vcreate.name: V热焰
vcreate.desc: Lowers the user's Speed, Defense, and Special Defense by 1 stage.

shadowpunch.name: 暗影拳
shadowpunch.desc: This move does not check accuracy.

wakeupslap.shortDesc: 如果目标处于睡眠状态，威力翻倍，然后拍醒它。
wakeupslap.name: 唤醒巴掌
wakeupslap.desc: Power doubles if the target is asleep. If the user has not fainted, the target wakes up.

meditate.shortDesc: 使使用者的攻击上升一级。
meditate.name: 瑜珈姿势
meditate.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.

rage.shortDesc: 如果在使用技能时受到攻击，使用者的攻击上升一级。
rage.name: 愤怒
rage.desc: Once this move is successfuly used, the user's Attack is raised by 1 stage every time it is hit by another Pokemon's attack as long as this move is chosen for use.

bonerush.name: 骨棒乱打
bonerush.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

acidarmor.shortDesc: 令使用者的防御提升2级。
acidarmor.name: 溶化
acidarmor.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

drainingkiss.shortDesc: 使用者将造成伤害的75%转化为自身的HP。
drainingkiss.name: 吸收之吻
drainingkiss.desc: The user recovers 3/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

lunge.name: 猛扑
lunge.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.

accelerock.shortDesc: 一定能先发制人进行攻击。
accelerock.name: 冲岩

octazooka.name: 章鱼桶炮
octazooka.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

firepunch.shortDesc: 有10%的几率使目标陷入烧伤状态。
firepunch.name: 火焰拳
firepunch.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

followme.shortDesc: 所有对方使用的作用范围为单体选择的招式都会攻向自己。
followme.name: 看我嘛
followme.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the foe's team are redirected to the user if they are in range. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Ability Magic Bounce, or drawn in by the Abilities Lightning Rod or Storm Drain. Fails if it is not a Double or Triple Battle.

psybeam.shortDesc: 有10%的几率使目标陷入混乱状态。
psybeam.name: 精神光线
psybeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

happyhour.shortDesc: 没有什么可比较性的用处。
happyhour.name: 欢乐时光

yawn.shortDesc: 下一回合目标会陷入睡眠状态
yawn.name: 哈欠
yawn.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep at the end of the next turn. Fails when used if the target cannot fall asleep or if it already has a major status condition. At the end of the next turn, if the target is still on the field, does not have a major status condition, and can fall asleep, it falls asleep. If the target becomes affected, this effect cannot be prevented by Safeguard or a substitute, or by falling asleep and waking up during the effect.

mirrormove.shortDesc: 使用目标最后使用过的招式。
mirrormove.name: 鹦鹉学舌
mirrormove.desc: The user uses the last move used by the target. The copied move is used against that target, if possible. Fails if the target has not made a move, or the last move used was Acupressure, After You, Aromatherapy, Aromatic Mist, Belch, Conversion 2, Counter, Crafty Shield, Curse, Doom Desire, Electric Terrain, Final Gambit, Flower Shield, Focus Punch, Future Sight, Grassy Terrain, Gravity, Guard Split, Hail, Happy Hour, Haze, Heal Bell, Heal Pulse, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, Ion Deluge, Light Screen, Lucky Chant, Magnetic Flux, Mat Block, Me First, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Mist, Misty Terrain, Mud Sport, Nature Power, Perish Song, Power Split, Psych Up, Quick Guard, Rain Dance, Reflect, Reflect Type, Role Play, Rototiller, Safeguard, Sandstorm, Sketch, Spikes, Spit Up, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, Struggle, Sunny Day, Tailwind, Toxic Spikes, Transform, Water Sport, Wide Guard, or any move that is self-targeting.

reflecttype.shortDesc: 使用者变得和目标的属性相同。
reflecttype.name: 镜面属性
reflecttype.desc: Causes the user's types to become the same as the current types of the target. Fails if the user is an Arceus.

shelltrap.shortDesc: 若受到对手物理攻击，就攻击目标造成伤害。
shelltrap.name: 陷阱甲壳
shelltrap.desc: Fails unless the user is hit by a physical attack this turn before it can execute the move.

powertrip.shortDesc: 每上升一级能力技能威力增加20点。
powertrip.name: 嚣张
powertrip.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.

venomdrench.shortDesc: 使已中毒的对手攻击和特攻下降一级。
venomdrench.name: 毒液陷阱
venomdrench.desc: Lowers the target's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 1 stage if the target is poisoned. Fails if the target is not poisoned.

tailglow.shortDesc: 提升使用者的特攻三级。
tailglow.name: 萤火
tailglow.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 3 stages.

minimize.shortDesc: 使使用者的回避率上升2级。
minimize.name: 变小
minimize.desc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 2 stages. Whether or not the user's evasiveness was changed, Body Slam, Dragon Rush, Flying Press, Heat Crash, Phantom Force, Shadow Force, Steamroller, and Stomp will not check accuracy and have their damage doubled if used against the user while it is active.

teeterdance.shortDesc: 使周围的宝可梦陷入混乱状态。
teeterdance.name: 摇晃舞
teeterdance.desc: Causes the target to become confused.

struggle.shortDesc: 使用者损失最大HP的25%作为反弹伤害。
struggle.name: 挣扎
struggle.desc: Deals typeless damage to one adjacent foe at random. If this move was successful, the user loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up; the Ability Rock Head does not prevent this. This move can only be used if none of the user's known moves can be selected.

eerieimpulse.name: 怪异电波
eerieimpulse.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 2 stages.

trumpcard.name: 王牌
trumpcard.desc: This move does not check accuracy. The power of this move is based on the amount of PP remaining after normal PP reduction and the Ability Pressure resolve. 200 power for 0 PP, 80 power for 1 PP, 60 power for 2 PP, 50 power for 3 PP, and 40 power for 4 or more PP.

rest.shortDesc: 使用者睡眠两回合，回复所有的HP，治愈异常状态。
rest.name: 睡觉
rest.desc: The user falls asleep for the next two turns and restores all of its HP, curing itself of any major status condition in the process. Fails if the user has full HP, is already asleep, or if another effect is preventing sleep.

needlearm.shortDesc: 有30%的几率使目标陷入畏缩状态。
needlearm.name: 尖刺臂
needlearm.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

mistyterrain.shortDesc: 五回合内，站在地上的宝可梦面不会陷入负面状态，且受到龙系招式的伤害减半。
mistyterrain.name: 薄雾场地
mistyterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Misty Terrain. During the effect, the power of Dragon-type attacks used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5 and grounded Pokemon cannot be inflicted with a major status condition nor confusion. Camouflage transforms the user into a Fairy type, Nature Power becomes Moonblast, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to lower Special Attack by 1 stage. Fails if the current terrain is Misty Terrain.

highjumpkick.shortDesc: 如果技能未命中则使用者失去最大HP的50%。
highjumpkick.name: 飞膝踢
highjumpkick.desc: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Ability Magic Guard are unaffected by crash damage.

trickroom.shortDesc: 5回合内，速度慢的宝可梦会先手使出技能。
trickroom.name: 戏法空间
trickroom.desc: For 5 turns, all active Pokemon with lower Speed will move before those with higher Speed, within their priority brackets. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.

thunderbolt.name: 十万伏特
thunderbolt.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

safeguard.shortDesc: 5回合内，保护己方所有宝可梦免受异常状态。
safeguard.name: 神秘守护
safeguard.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot have major status conditions or confusion inflicted on them by other Pokemon. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Defog.

flashcannon.shortDesc: 有10%的几率使目标的特防下降一级。
flashcannon.name: 加农光炮
flashcannon.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

thrash.shortDesc: 持续2-3回合，冷静下来后会混乱。
thrash.name: 大闹一番
thrash.desc: Deals damage to one adjacent foe at random. The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused after the last turn of the effect if it is not already. If the user is prevented from moving or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.

featherdance.shortDesc: 使目标的攻击下降两级。
featherdance.name: 羽毛舞
featherdance.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.

fusionbolt.shortDesc: 如果在攻击前被交织火焰击中的话威力加倍。
fusionbolt.name: 交错闪电
fusionbolt.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Flare.

shadowforce.shortDesc: 第一回合突然消失，第二回合攻击。破坏目标的守住状态。
shadowforce.name: 暗影潜袭
shadowforce.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.

icebeam.name: 冰冻光束
icebeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

phantomforce.shortDesc: 第一回合突然消失，第二回合攻击。破坏目标的守住状态。
phantomforce.name: 潜灵奇袭
phantomforce.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.

darkpulse.name: 恶之波动
darkpulse.desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target.

bite.shortDesc: 有30%的几率使目标陷入畏缩状态。
bite.name: 咬住
bite.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

steamroller.shortDesc: 有30%的几率使目标陷入畏缩状态。
steamroller.name: 疯狂滚压
steamroller.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.

triplekick.shortDesc: 连续攻击三次。每一次都可以被回避，但击中的话威力会上升。
triplekick.desc: Hits three times. Power increases to 20 for the second hit and 30 for the third. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids any of the hits. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit three times.
triplekick.name: 三连踢

perishsong.shortDesc: 所有在场的宝可梦会在三回合内倒下。
perishsong.name: 灭亡之歌
perishsong.desc: Each active Pokemon receives a perish count of 4 if it doesn't already have a perish count. At the end of each turn including the turn used, the perish count of all active Pokemon lowers by 1 and Pokemon faint if the number reaches 0. The perish count is removed from Pokemon that switch out. If a Pokemon uses Baton Pass while it has a perish count, the replacement will gain the perish count and continue to count down.

nightshade.shortDesc: 技能伤害和使用者的等级相同。
nightshade.name: 黑夜魔影
nightshade.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.

icehammer.shortDesc: 使使用者的速度下降一级。
icehammer.name: 冰锤
icehammer.desc: Lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage.

grudge.shortDesc: 如果使用者倒下，则对方最后使用的攻击失去所有PP。
grudge.name: 怨念
grudge.desc: Until the user's next turn, if a foe's attack knocks the user out, that foe loses all remaining PP for that attack.

transform.shortDesc: 复制对手的能力等级变化，招式，属性，特性。
transform.name: 变身
transform.desc: The user transforms into the target. The target's current stats, stat stages, types, moves, Ability, weight, gender, and sprite are copied. The user's level and HP remain the same and each copied move receives only 5 PP, with a maximum of 5 PP each. The user can no longer change formes if it would have the ability to do so. This move fails if the target has a substitute, if either the user or the target is already transformed, or if either is behind an Illusion.

stokedsparksurfer.name: 驾雷驭电戏冲浪
stokedsparksurfer.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

thunderpunch.name: 雷电拳
thunderpunch.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

lovelykiss.name: 恶魔之吻
lovelykiss.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

magikarpsrevenge.shortDesc: Does many things turn 1. Can't move turn 2.
magikarpsrevenge.name: Magikarp's Revenge
magikarpsrevenge.desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target and lower its Defense and Special Attack by 1 stage. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. If this move is successful, the weather changes to rain unless it is already in effect, and the user gains the effects of Aqua Ring and Magic Coat.

nastyplot.shortDesc: 使使用者的特攻上升两级。
nastyplot.name: 诡计
nastyplot.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.

flameburst.shortDesc: 击中目标的同时也会伤害到其身边的宝可梦。
flameburst.name: 烈焰溅射
flameburst.desc: If this move is successful, each ally adjacent to the target loses 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, unless it has the Ability Magic Guard.

foresight.shortDesc: 格斗系，一般系技能能击中鬼系。无视回避率变化。
foresight.name: 识破
foresight.desc: Causes the target to have its positive evasiveness stat stage ignored while it is active. Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. The effect ends when the target is no longer active. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Miracle Eye or Odor Sleuth.

recycle.shortDesc: 回收使用者上一次使用的道具。
recycle.name: 回收利用
recycle.desc: The user regains the item it last used, if it is not holding an item. Fails if the user was not holding an item, if the item was a popped Air Balloon, if the item was picked up by a Pokemon with the Ability Pickup, or if the item was lost to Bug Bite, Covet, Incinerate, Knock Off, Pluck, or Thief. Items thrown with Fling can be regained.

skyattack.shortDesc: 第一回合充能第二回合攻击，容易击中要害。
skyattack.name: 神鸟猛击
skyattack.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target and a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

roleplay.shortDesc: 使用者将自身的特性变得和目标一样。
roleplay.name: 扮演
roleplay.desc: The user's Ability changes to match the target's Ability. Fails if the user's Ability is Multitype, Stance Change, or already matches the target, or if the target's Ability is Flower Gift, Forecast, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Stance Change, Trace, Wonder Guard, or Zen Mode.

coreenforcer.shortDesc: 使出后能够消除已经在该回合使出招式的对手的特性。
coreenforcer.name: 核心惩罚者
coreenforcer.desc: If the user moves after the target, the target's Ability is rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. If the target's Ability is Multitype or Stance Change, this effect does not happen.

hyperbeam.shortDesc: 使用者下回合无法移动
hyperbeam.name: 破坏光线
hyperbeam.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.

curse.shortDesc: 如果使用者具有鬼属性，诅咒对手。如果没有，则提升攻击和防御各一级，速度下降一级。
curse.name: 诅咒
curse.desc: If the user is not a Ghost type, lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. If the user is a Ghost type, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down and even if it would cause fainting, in exchange for the target losing 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn while it is active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if there is no target or if the target is already affected.

hypnosis.name: 催眠术
hypnosis.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

shockwave.name: 电击波
shockwave.desc: This move does not check accuracy.

recover.shortDesc: 使使用者回复自身最大HP的50%。
recover.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
recover.name: 自我再生

silverwind.shortDesc: 有10%的几率提升自身各项能力一级（除回避率，命中率）
silverwind.name: 银色旋风
silverwind.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.

sunnyday.shortDesc: 5回合内，阳光增加了火属性招式的威力。
sunnyday.name: 大晴天
sunnyday.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day. The damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Heat Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sunny Day.

crushclaw.shortDesc: 有50%的几率使对手的防御下降一级。
crushclaw.name: 撕裂爪
crushclaw.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

snarl.shortDesc: 100%使(所有)对手的特攻下降一级。
snarl.name: 大声咆哮
snarl.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.

hypervoice.shortDesc: 攻击对手造成伤害。攻击邻近的宝可梦。
hypervoice.name: 巨声

shadowball.name: 暗影球
shadowball.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

iciclecrash.shortDesc: 有30%的几率使目标陷入畏缩状态。
iciclecrash.name: 冰柱坠击
iciclecrash.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

solarbeam.shortDesc: 第一回合充能第二回合攻击，在晴天不用充能。
solarbeam.name: 日光束
solarbeam.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn.

throatchop.shortDesc: 2回合内目标无法使用声音的技能。
throatchop.name: 地狱突刺
throatchop.desc: For 2 turns, the target cannot use sound-based moves.

psychicterrain.shortDesc: 5回合内站在地面上的宝可梦使用超能力技能威力为原来的1.5被，对他们使用的先制技能将会使用失败。
psychicterrain.name: 精神场地
psychicterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Psychic Terrain. During the effect, the power of Psychic-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 and grounded Pokemon cannot be hit by moves with priority greater than 0. Camouflage transforms the user into a Psychic type, Nature Power becomes Psychic, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to do something. Fails if the current terrain is Psychic Terrain.

bide.shortDesc: 等待两回合，之后将受到的伤害双倍奉还给对手。
bide.name: 忍耐
bide.desc: The user spends two turns locked into this move and then, on the second turn after using this move, the user attacks the last Pokemon that hit it, inflicting double the damage in HP it lost during the two turns. If the last Pokemon that hit it is no longer on the field, the user attacks a random foe instead. If the user is prevented from moving during this move's use, the effect ends. This move does not check accuracy.

grassknot.name: 打草结
grassknot.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its weight. Power is 20 if less than 10kg, 40 if less than 25kg, 60 if less than 50kg, 80 if less than 100kg, 100 if less than 200kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200kg.

extrasensory.name: 神通力
extrasensory.desc: Has a 10% chance to flinch the target.

shiftgear.shortDesc: 提升使用者的速度2级，攻击一级。
shiftgear.name: 换挡
shiftgear.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages and its Attack by 1 stage.

crushgrip.shortDesc: 目标剩余的HP越多，此技能威力越高。
crushgrip.name: 捏碎
crushgrip.desc: Power is equal to 120 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP), rounded half down, but not less than 1.

wish.shortDesc: 下一回合使用者回复最大HP的50%。
wish.name: 祈愿
wish.desc: At the end of the next turn, the Pokemon at the user's position has 1/2 of the user's maximum HP restored to it, rounded half up. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's position.

whirlwind.shortDesc: 使目标和后备精灵替换。
whirlwind.name: 吹飞
whirlwind.desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Ability Suction Cups.

clangoroussoulblaze.shortDesc: Boosts all stats 1 stage. Hits adjacent foes.
clangoroussoulblaze.name: 炽魂热舞烈音爆
clangoroussoulblaze.desc: Boosts the user's Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed by one stage.

brickbreak.shortDesc: 摧毁目标队伍的墙，除非目标免疫此攻击。
brickbreak.name: 劈瓦
brickbreak.desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.

gunkshot.name: 垃圾射击
gunkshot.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

hammerarm.shortDesc: 使使用者的速度下降一级。
hammerarm.name: 臂锤
hammerarm.desc: Lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage.

mefirst.shortDesc: 抢先使出对手将要使出的技能。使用者必须更快。
mefirst.name: 抢先一步
mefirst.desc: The user uses the move the target chose for use this turn against it, if possible, with its power multiplied by 1.5. The move must be a damaging move other than Chatter, Counter, Covet, Focus Punch, Me First, Metal Burst, Mirror Coat, Thief, or Struggle. Fails if the target moves before the user. Ignores the target's substitute for the purpose of copying the move.

snore.shortDesc: 使用者必须处于睡眠状态。30%使目标畏缩。
snore.name: 鼾声
snore.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Fails if the user is not asleep.

hail.name: 冰雹
hail.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Hail. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are an Ice type, or have the Abilities Ice Body, Magic Guard, Overcoat, or Snow Cloak. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Icy Rock. Fails if the current weather is Hail.

dualchop.name: 二连劈
dualchop.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

crabhammer.name: 蟹钳锤
crabhammer.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

mudslap.name: 掷泥
mudslap.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

smartstrike.name: 修长之角
smartstrike.desc: This move does not check accuracy.

auroraveil.shortDesc: 五回合内，同伴所受到的伤害为原来的一半。只能在冰雹天气时使用成功。
auroraveil.name: 极光幕
auroraveil.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical and special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Critical hits ignore this protection. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails unless the weather is Hail.

refresh.shortDesc: 使用者能够治愈自身的烧伤中毒麻痹状态。
refresh.name: 焕然一新
refresh.desc: The user cures its burn, poison, or paralysis.

dragonascent.shortDesc: 使使用者的防御和特防下降一级。
dragonascent.name: 画龙点睛
dragonascent.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.

celebrate.shortDesc: 没有什么可比较性的用处。或者说是没用。
celebrate.name: 庆祝

powder.shortDesc: 如果目标使用了火系技能则会失去最大HP的1/4.
powder.name: 粉尘
powder.desc: If the target uses a Fire-type move this turn, it is prevented from executing and the target loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.

hornleech.shortDesc: 使用者将造成伤害的50%转化为自身的HP。
hornleech.name: 木角
hornleech.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

tearfullook.shortDesc: 降低目标的攻击和特攻一级。
tearfullook.name: 泪眼汪汪
tearfullook.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.

telekinesis.shortDesc: 三回合内，目标漂浮起来，但技能一定会命中它。
telekinesis.name: 意念移物
telekinesis.desc: For 3 turns, the target cannot avoid any attacks made against it, other than OHKO moves, as long as it remains active. During the effect, the target is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Ability Arena Trap as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball override this move if the target is under any of their effects. Fails if the target is already under this effect or the effects of Ingrain, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.

dig.shortDesc: 第一回合找个地缝钻进去，第二回合攻击。
dig.name: 挖洞
dig.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Earthquake and Magnitude but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

originpulse.shortDesc: 攻击对手造成伤害。攻击邻近的宝可梦。
originpulse.name: 根源波动

aromatherapy.shortDesc: 治愈使用者队伍中所有宝可梦的异常状态。
aromatherapy.name: 芳香治疗
aromatherapy.desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its major status condition. Active Pokemon with the Ability Sap Sipper are not cured, unless they are the user.

punishment.shortDesc: 威力为60+20X目标的能力等级变化。
punishment.name: 惩罚
punishment.desc: Power is equal to 60+(X*20), where X is the target's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0, but not more than 200 power.

focusblast.shortDesc: 有10%的几率使目标的特防下降一级。
focusblast.name: 真气弹
focusblast.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

assurance.shortDesc: 如果使用者在这回合受到了攻击，威力翻倍。
assurance.name: 恶意追击
