assurance.desc: Power doubles if the target has already taken damage this turn, other than direct damage from Belly Drum, confusion, Curse, or Pain Split.

naturalgift.shortDesc: 威力和属性基于使用者携带的树果。
naturalgift.name: 自然之恩
naturalgift.desc: The type and power of this move depend on the user's held Berry, and the Berry is lost. Fails if the user is not holding a Berry, if the user has the Ability Klutz, or if Embargo or Magic Room is in effect for the user.

fireblast.shortDesc: 有10%的几率使目标陷入烧伤状态。
fireblast.name: 大字爆炎
fireblast.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

psychocut.name: 精神利刃
psychocut.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

raindance.shortDesc: 5回合内，大雨增加水系技能的威力。
raindance.name: 求雨
raindance.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Rain Dance. The damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Damp Rock. Fails if the current weather is Rain Dance.

topsyturvy.shortDesc: 将目标的全部能力阶级数值变为其相反数。
topsyturvy.name: 颠倒
topsyturvy.desc: The target's positive stat stages become negative and vice versa. Fails if all of the target's stat stages are 0.

scaryface.shortDesc: 使目标的速度下降两级
scaryface.name: 鬼面
scaryface.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

10000000voltthunderbolt.name: 10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt
10000000voltthunderbolt.desc: Has a very high chance for a critical hit.

embargo.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the target can't use any items.
embargo.name: 查封
embargo.desc: For 5 turns, the target's held item has no effect. An item's effect of causing forme changes is unaffected, but any other effects from such items are negated. During the effect, Fling and Natural Gift are prevented from being used by the target. Items thrown at the target with Fling will still activate for it. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to use items.

electricterrain.shortDesc: 五回合内，站在地上的宝可梦使用的电系技能的威力上升，不能陷入睡眠状态。
electricterrain.name: 电气场地
electricterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Electric Terrain. During the effect, the power of Electric-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 and grounded Pokemon cannot fall asleep; Pokemon already asleep do not wake up. Camouflage transforms the user into an Electric type, Nature Power becomes Thunderbolt, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause paralysis. Fails if the current terrain is Electric Terrain.

attract.shortDesc: 和使用者性别不同的对手会陷入着迷状态。
attract.name: 迷人
attract.desc: Causes the target to become infatuated, making it unable to attack 50% of the time. Fails if both the user and the target are the same gender, if either is genderless, or if the target is already infatuated. The effect ends when either the user or the target is no longer active. Pokemon with the Ability Oblivious or protected by the Ability Aroma Veil are immune.

mirrorcoat.shortDesc: 如果被特殊攻击伤害，则返还对手两倍的伤害。
mirrorcoat.name: 镜面反射
mirrorcoat.desc: Deals damage to the last foe to hit the user with a special attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals damage with a Base Power of 1 instead. If that foe's position is no longer in use, the damage is done to a random foe in range. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by a foe's special attack this turn.

futuresight.shortDesc: 使用该技能后，两回合后触发攻击效果。
futuresight.name: 预知未来
futuresight.desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position.

heartswap.shortDesc: 交换自身和目标的能力等级变化。
heartswap.name: 心灵交换
heartswap.desc: The user swaps all its stat stage changes with the target.

flail.shortDesc: 使用者的HP越少，技能威力越高。
flail.name: 抓狂
flail.desc: Deals damage to the target based on the amount of HP the user has left. X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down; the base power of this attack is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1.

poisonjab.name: 毒击
poisonjab.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

irondefense.shortDesc: 令使用者的防御提升2级。
irondefense.name: 铁壁
irondefense.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

softboiled.shortDesc: 使使用者回复自身最大HP的50%。
softboiled.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
softboiled.name: 生蛋

supersonic.name: 超音波
supersonic.desc: Causes the target to become confused.

quash.shortDesc: 使目标在本回合最后行动。
quash.name: 延后
quash.desc: Causes the target to take its turn after all other Pokemon this turn, no matter the priority of its selected move. Fails if the target already moved this turn.

aromaticmist.shortDesc: 提升一名同伴的特防1级。
aromaticmist.name: 芳香薄雾
aromaticmist.desc: Raises the target's Special Defense by 1 stage. Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user.

electrify.shortDesc: 使目标这回合使用的技能属性变为电系。
electrify.name: 输电
electrify.desc: Causes the target's move to become Electric type this turn. Fails if the target already moved this turn.

grassyterrain.shortDesc: 五回合内，站在地上的宝可梦使用的草系技能的威力上升，每回合回复最大HP的1/16。
grassyterrain.name: 青草场地
grassyterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Grassy Terrain. During the effect, the power of Grass-type attacks used by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5, the power of Bulldoze, Earthquake, and Magnitude used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5, and grounded Pokemon have 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, restored at the end of each turn, including the last turn. Camouflage transforms the user into a Grass type, Nature Power becomes Energy Ball, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause sleep. Fails if the current terrain is Grassy Terrain.

landswrath.shortDesc: 攻击对手造成伤害。攻击邻近的宝可梦。
landswrath.name: 大地神力

spikecannon.name: 尖刺加农炮
spikecannon.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

doublehit.name: 二连击
doublehit.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

soak.shortDesc: 将目标的属性变为水属性。
soak.name: 浸水
soak.desc: Causes the target to become a Water type. Fails if the target is an Arceus.

fleurcannon.shortDesc: 使使用者的特攻下降两级。
fleurcannon.name: 花朵加农炮
fleurcannon.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.

rocktomb.name: 岩石封锁
rocktomb.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

energyball.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def. by 1.
energyball.name: 能量球
energyball.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

relicsong.shortDesc: 10%使（所有）对手陷入睡眠状态。梅洛耶塔能够变换形态。
relicsong.name: 古老之歌
relicsong.desc: Has a 10% chance to cause the target to fall asleep. If this move is successful on at least one target and the user is a Meloetta, it changes to Pirouette Forme if it is currently in Aria Forme, or changes to Aria Forme if it is currently in Pirouette Forme. This forme change does not happen if the Meloetta has the Ability Sheer Force. The Pirouette Forme reverts to Aria Forme when Meloetta is not active.

triattack.name: 三冲攻击
triattack.desc: Has a 20% chance to either burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

furyattack.name: 乱击
furyattack.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

flareblitz.shortDesc: 有33%的反弹伤害。10%使目标陷入烧伤状态。能使使用者解除冰冻状态。
flareblitz.name: 闪焰冲锋
flareblitz.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

captivate.shortDesc: 如果目标的性别和使用者相反，目标的特攻下降两级。
captivate.name: 诱惑
captivate.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 2 stages. The target is unaffected if both the user and the target are the same gender, or if either is genderless. Pokemon with the Ability Oblivious are immune.

doubleedge.name: 舍身冲撞
doubleedge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

takedown.name: 猛撞
takedown.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

outrage.shortDesc: 持续2-3回合，冷静下来后会混乱。
outrage.name: 逆鳞
outrage.desc: Deals damage to one adjacent foe at random. The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused after the last turn of the effect if it is not already. If the user is prevented from moving or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.

mimic.shortDesc: 这个技能将会变成目标会后使出的技能。
mimic.name: 模仿
mimic.desc: This move is replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has the maximum PP for that move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, or if the move is Chatter, Mimic, Sketch, Struggle, or Transform.

brutalswing.shortDesc: 攻击目标造成伤害。攻击邻近的宝可梦。
brutalswing.name: 狂舞挥打

surf.shortDesc: 攻击邻近的宝可梦。对潜水的目标造成两倍伤害。
surf.name: 冲浪
surf.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dive.

holdhands.shortDesc: 没有什么可比较性的用处。或者说是没用。
holdhands.name: 牵手
holdhands.desc: Nothing happens... Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user.

synchronoise.shortDesc: 攻击和使用者有相同属性的宝可梦。
synchronoise.name: 同步干扰
synchronoise.desc: The target is immune if it does not share a type with the user.

toxic.name: 剧毒
toxic.desc: Badly poisons the target. If a Poison-type Pokemon uses this move, the target cannot avoid the attack, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move.

aircutter.shortDesc: 容易击中要害。攻击邻近的对手
aircutter.name: 空气利刃
aircutter.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

cosmicpower.shortDesc: 提升使用者的防御和特防各一级。
cosmicpower.name: 宇宙力量
cosmicpower.desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.

fling.shortDesc: 使用者投掷携带的道具进行攻击。威力会改变。
fling.name: 投掷
fling.desc: The power of this move is based on the user's held item. The held item is lost and it activates for the target if applicable. If there is no target or the target avoids this move by protecting itself, the user's held item is still lost. The user can regain a thrown item with Recycle or the Ability Harvest. Fails if the user has no held item, if the held item cannot be thrown, if the user is under the effect of Embargo or Magic Room, or if the user has the Ability Klutz.

chipaway.shortDesc: 无视目标的能力等级变化进行攻击。
chipaway.name: 逐步击破
chipaway.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.

screech.shortDesc: 使目标的防御下降两级。
screech.name: 刺耳声
screech.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 2 stages.

forestscurse.name: 森林诅咒
forestscurse.desc: Causes the Grass type to be added to the target, effectively making it have two or three types. Fails if the target is already a Grass type. If Trick-or-Treat adds a type to the target, it replaces the type added by this move and vice versa.

lockon.shortDesc: 使用者下一回合对目标的攻击将不会被回避。
lockon.name: 锁定
lockon.desc: On the following turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. Fails if the user used this move successfully last turn and that target is still active.

synthesis.shortDesc: 恢复使用者的HP，回复量随天气变化。
synthesis.name: 光合作用
synthesis.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down.

blazekick.shortDesc: 容易击中要害。有10%的几率使对手陷入烧伤状态。
blazekick.name: 火焰踢
blazekick.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.

meanlook.shortDesc: 目标将无法替换其它精灵上场
meanlook.name: 黑色目光
meanlook.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.

bodyslam.shortDesc: 有30%的几率使对手陷入麻痹状态。
bodyslam.name: 泰山压顶
bodyslam.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.

block.shortDesc: 目标将无法替换其它精灵上场
block.name: 挡路
block.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.

lusterpurge.name: 洁净光芒
lusterpurge.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

belch.shortDesc: 再使用者食用树果前不能被使用。
belch.name: 打嗝
belch.desc: This move cannot be selected until the user eats a Berry, either by eating one that was held, stealing and eating one off another Pokemon with Bug Bite or Pluck, or eating one that was thrown at it with Fling. Once the condition is met, this move can be selected and used for the rest of the battle even if the user gains or uses another item or switches out. Consuming a Berry with Natural Gift does not count for the purposes of eating one.

faketears.shortDesc: 使目标的特防下降两级。
faketears.name: 假哭
faketears.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.

storedpower.shortDesc: 每上升一级能力技能威力增加20点。
storedpower.name: 辅助力量
storedpower.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.

icepunch.name: 冷冻拳
icepunch.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

falseswipe.shortDesc: 总会使目标留下至少一点HP。
falseswipe.name: 点到为止
falseswipe.desc: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.

sweetscent.shortDesc: 降低（所有）对手的回避率2级。
sweetscent.name: 甜甜香气
sweetscent.desc: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 2 stages.

metronome.shortDesc: 根据使用者的rp随机使出一个技能。
metronome.name: 节拍器
metronome.desc: A random move is selected for use, other than After You, Assist, Belch, Bestow, Celebrate, Chatter, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Crafty Shield, Destiny Bond, Detect, Diamond Storm, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Freeze Shock, Happy Hour, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, Hyperspace Hole, Ice Burn, King's Shield, Light of Ruin, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Protect, Quash, Quick Guard, Rage Powder, Relic Song, Secret Sword, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snarl, Snatch, Snore, Spiky Shield, Steam Eruption, Struggle, Switcheroo, Techno Blast, Thief, Thousand Arrows, Thousand Waves, Transform, Trick, V-create, or Wide Guard.

hyperfang.name: 必杀门牙
hyperfang.desc: Has a 10% chance to flinch the target.

frenzyplant.shortDesc: 使用者下回合无法移动
frenzyplant.name: 疯狂植物
frenzyplant.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.

liquidation.name: 水流裂破
liquidation.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

haze.shortDesc: 消除所有能力等级变化
haze.name: 黑雾
haze.desc: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.

incinerate.shortDesc: 烧毁对手的树果和珠宝。
incinerate.name: 烧尽
incinerate.desc: The target loses its held item if it is a Berry or a Gem. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Ability Sticky Hold to lose their held item. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Ability Harvest.

thousandwaves.shortDesc: 攻击周围的对手。阻止他们替换下场。
thousandwaves.name: 千波激荡
thousandwaves.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.

oblivionwing.shortDesc: 使用者将造成伤害的75%转化为自身的HP。
oblivionwing.name: 死亡之翼
oblivionwing.desc: The user recovers 3/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

solarblade.shortDesc: 第一回合充能第二回合攻击，在晴天不用充能。
solarblade.name: 日光刃
solarblade.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn.

pluck.shortDesc: 使用者将窃取并食用目标的树果。
pluck.name: 啄食
pluck.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Ability Harvest.

suckerpunch.shortDesc: 一定能先发制人进行攻击。如果目标不使用攻击技能的话则使用失败。
suckerpunch.name: 突袭
suckerpunch.desc: Fails if the target did not select a physical attack, special attack, or Me First for use this turn, or if the target moves before the user.

hydrocannon.shortDesc: 使用者下回合无法移动
hydrocannon.name: 加农水炮
hydrocannon.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.

guillotine.shortDesc: 一击必杀。如果使用者的等级低于目标则使用技能失败。
guillotine.name: 断头钳
guillotine.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Ability Sturdy are immune.

feintattack.name: 出奇一击
feintattack.desc: This move does not check accuracy.

psychicfangs.shortDesc: 摧毁目标队伍的墙，除非目标免疫此攻击。
psychicfangs.name: 精神之牙
psychicfangs.desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.

disable.shortDesc: 四回合内，目标最后使用的技能将无法再被使用。
disable.name: 定身法
disable.desc: For 4 turns, the target's last move used becomes disabled. Fails if one of the target's moves is already disabled, if the target has not made a move, or if the target no longer knows the move.

leechlife.shortDesc: 使用者将造成伤害的50%转化为自身的HP。
leechlife.name: 吸血
leechlife.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

gastroacid.name: 胃液
gastroacid.desc: Causes the target's Ability to be rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. Fails if the target's Ability is Multitype or Stance Change.

cottonguard.shortDesc: 提升使用者的防御三级。
cottonguard.name: 棉花防守
cottonguard.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 3 stages.

firstimpression.shortDesc: 先制攻击，只能在出场后第一回合使用。
firstimpression.name: 迎头一击
firstimpression.desc: Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.

gigadrain.shortDesc: 使用者将造成伤害的50%转化为自身的HP。
gigadrain.name: 终极吸取
gigadrain.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

luckychant.shortDesc: 5回合内，对手的攻击不会击中使用者的要害。
luckychant.name: 幸运咒语
luckychant.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot be struck by a critical hit. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's side.

karatechop.name: 空手劈
karatechop.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

flatter.shortDesc: 使目标的特攻上升一级，使目标陷入混乱状态。
flatter.name: 吹捧
flatter.desc: Raises the target's Special Attack by 1 stage and confuses it.

focuspunch.shortDesc: 如果在使用招式前受到攻击则技能使用失败。
focuspunch.name: 真气拳
focuspunch.desc: The user loses its focus and does nothing if it is hit by a damaging attack this turn before it can execute the move.

painsplit.name: 分担痛楚
painsplit.desc: The user and the target's HP become the average of their current HP, rounded down, but not more than the maximum HP of either one.

acidspray.name: 酸液炸弹
acidspray.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.

miracleeye.shortDesc: 超能系技能可以命中恶系。无视回避率变化。
miracleeye.name: 奇迹之眼
miracleeye.desc: Causes the target to have its positive evasiveness stat stage ignored while it is active. Psychic-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Dark type. The effect ends when the target is no longer active. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Odor Sleuth.

nightdaze.name: 暗黑爆破
nightdaze.desc: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

odorsleuth.shortDesc: 格斗系，一般系技能能击中鬼系。无视回避率变化。
odorsleuth.name: 气味侦测
odorsleuth.desc: Causes the target to have its positive evasiveness stat stage ignored while it is active. Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. The effect ends when the target is no longer active. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Miracle Eye.

lightofruin.name: 破灭之光
lightofruin.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

powdersnow.name: 细雪
powdersnow.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

bulletpunch.shortDesc: 一定能先发制人进行攻击。
bulletpunch.name: 子弹拳

cometpunch.name: 连续拳
cometpunch.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

dragondance.shortDesc: 提升使用者的攻击和速度各一级。
dragondance.name: 龙之舞
dragondance.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage.

spectralthief.shortDesc: 窃取对手的能力等级变化。
spectralthief.name: 暗影偷盗
spectralthief.desc: The target's raised stat stages are stolen from it and applied to the user before dealing damage.

swallow.shortDesc: 回复量取决于蓄力的次数。
swallow.name: 吞下
swallow.desc: The user restores its HP based on its Stockpile count. Restores 1/4 of its maximum HP if it's 1, 1/2 of its maximum HP if it's 2, both rounded half down, and all of its HP if it's 3. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. The user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.

clamp.name: 贝壳夹击
clamp.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns; seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.

freezeshock.shortDesc: 第一回合充能，第二回合攻击。有30%的几率使对手陷入麻痹状态。
freezeshock.name: 冰冻伏特
freezeshock.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

endeavor.shortDesc: 使目标的HP降得和使用者的HP相同。
endeavor.name: 蛮干
endeavor.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (target's current HP - user's current HP). The target is unaffected if its current HP is less than or equal to the user's current HP.

waterpulse.shortDesc: 有20%的几率使目标陷入混乱状态。
waterpulse.name: 水之波动
waterpulse.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

splash.shortDesc: 什么事都不干（然而我们仍然喜欢它）。
splash.name: 跃起

harden.shortDesc: 使使用者的防御提升一级。
harden.name: 变硬
harden.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.

psychoboost.shortDesc: 使使用者的特攻下降两级。
psychoboost.name: 精神增压
psychoboost.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.

thunder.shortDesc: 30%使目标麻痹，在雨天一定会命中。
thunder.name: 打雷
thunder.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop. If the weather is Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%.

conversion.shortDesc: 使使用者的属性变的和自身已学会的第一个招式的属性相同。
conversion.name: 纹理
conversion.desc: The user's type changes to match the original type of the move in its first move slot. Fails if the user cannot change its type, or if the type is one of the user's current types.

blastburn.shortDesc: 使用者下回合无法移动
blastburn.name: 爆裂烈焰
blastburn.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.

mirrorshot.name: 镜光射击
mirrorshot.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

charm.shortDesc: 使目标的攻击下降两级。
charm.name: 撒娇
charm.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.

moonlight.shortDesc: 恢复使用者的HP，回复量随天气变化。
moonlight.name: 月光
moonlight.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down.

submission.name: 地狱翻滚
submission.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

poisontail.shortDesc: 容易击中要害。有10%的几率使对手中毒。
poisontail.name: 毒尾
poisontail.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.

spore.name: 蘑菇孢子
spore.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

nuzzle.name: 蹭蹭脸颊
nuzzle.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

sing.name: 唱歌
sing.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

sandtomb.name: 流沙地狱
sandtomb.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns; seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.

psychup.shortDesc: 复制对手的能力等级变化。
psychup.name: 自我暗示
psychup.desc: The user copies all of the target's current stat stage changes.

echoedvoice.shortDesc: 如果连续使用此招式威力会上升。
echoedvoice.name: 回声
echoedvoice.desc: For every consecutive turn that this move is used by at least one Pokemon, this move's power is multiplied by the number of turns to pass, but not more than 5.

forcepalm.shortDesc: 有30%的几率使对手陷入麻痹状态。
forcepalm.name: 发劲
forcepalm.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

healorder.shortDesc: 使使用者回复自身最大HP的50%。
healorder.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
healorder.name: 回复指令

iceshard.shortDesc: 一定能先发制人进行攻击。
iceshard.name: 冰砾

roost.shortDesc: 回复最大HP的50%，在回合结束前失去飞行属性。
roost.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. Until the end of the turn, Flying-type users lose their Flying type and pure Flying-type users become Normal type. Does nothing if the user's HP is full.
roost.name: 羽栖

bulldoze.shortDesc: 100%使临近的宝可梦速度下降一级。
bulldoze.name: 重踏
bulldoze.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

sleeppowder.name: 催眠粉
sleeppowder.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

burnup.shortDesc: User's Fire-type is removed until it switches out.
burnup.name: 燃尽
burnup.desc: Until the user is no longer active, Fire-type users lose their Fire type and pure Fire-type users become Normal type.

batonpass.shortDesc: 使用者和后备精灵替换，能够接力能力等级变化等。
batonpass.name: 接棒
batonpass.desc: The user is replaced with another Pokemon in its party. The selected Pokemon has the user's stat stage changes, confusion, and certain move effects transferred to it.

reflect.shortDesc: 5回合内，物理攻击对己方的伤害减半。
reflect.name: 反射壁
reflect.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double or Triple Battle. Critical hits ignore this protection. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break or Defog. Brick Break removes the effect before damage is calculated. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay.

absorb.shortDesc: 使用者将造成伤害的50%转化为自身的HP。
absorb.name: 吸取
absorb.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

bulkup.shortDesc: 提升使用者的供给和防御各一级。
bulkup.name: 健美
bulkup.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.

spite.shortDesc: 使目标最后使用的技能PP减少4点。
spite.name: 怨恨
spite.desc: Causes the target's last move used to lose 4 PP. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if it no longer knows the move.

confusion.shortDesc: 有10%的几率使目标陷入混乱状态。
confusion.name: 念力
confusion.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

bounce.shortDesc: 第一回合跃起，第二回合攻击。有30%的几率使对手陷入麻痹状态。
bounce.name: 弹跳
bounce.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

bubble.shortDesc: 有10%的几率使（所有）对手的速度下降一级。
bubble.name: 泡沫
bubble.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

charge.shortDesc: 提升下次电属性招式的威力，并提升使用者的特防一级。
charge.name: 充电
charge.desc: Raises the user's Special Defense by 1 stage. If the user uses an Electric-type attack on the next turn, its power will be doubled.

rockclimb.shortDesc: 有20%的几率使目标陷入混乱状态。
rockclimb.name: 攀岩
rockclimb.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

lavaplume.shortDesc: 30%使邻近的宝可梦陷入烧伤状态。
lavaplume.name: 喷烟
lavaplume.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

sparklingaria.shortDesc: 目标的烧伤状态会被治愈。
sparklingaria.name: 泡影的咏叹
sparklingaria.desc: If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of its burn.

aerialace.name: 燕返
aerialace.desc: This move does not check accuracy.

signalbeam.shortDesc: 有10%的几率使目标陷入混乱状态。
signalbeam.name: 信号光束
signalbeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

allyswitch.shortDesc: 使用者与同伴交换位置。
allyswitch.name: 交换场地
allyswitch.desc: The user swaps positions with its ally. Fails if the user is the only Pokemon on its side.

fellstinger.shortDesc: 如果这一击击倒了目标，使用者的攻击提升3级。
fellstinger.name: 致命针刺
fellstinger.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 3 stages if this move knocks out the target.

horndrill.shortDesc: 一击必杀。如果使用者的等级低于目标则使用技能失败。
horndrill.name: 角钻
horndrill.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Ability Sturdy are immune.

strengthsap.shortDesc: 使用者回复和对手初始攻击等同的HP，降低对手的攻击一级。
strengthsap.name: 吸取力量
strengthsap.desc: The user restores its HP equal to the target's Attack stat, calculated with its stat stage, then lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.

simplebeam.name: 单纯光束
simplebeam.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become Simple. Fails if the target's Ability is Multitype, Simple, Stance Change, or Truant.

amnesia.shortDesc: 令使用者的特防提升2级。
amnesia.name: 瞬间失忆
amnesia.desc: Raises the user's Special Defense by 2 stages.

defog.shortDesc: 使目标的回避率下降一级，清除目标队伍的白雾。
defog.name: 清除浓雾
defog.desc: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 1 stage. If this move is successful and whether or not the target's evasiveness was affected, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, Safeguard, Mist, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the target's side, and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the user's side. Ignores a target's substitute, although a substitute will still block the lowering of evasiveness.

inferno.name: 炼狱
inferno.desc: Has a 100% chance to burn the target.

seedflare.name: 种子闪光
seedflare.desc: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.

rototiller.shortDesc: 提升草属性宝可梦的攻击和特攻各一级。
rototiller.name: 耕地
rototiller.desc: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grounded Grass-type Pokemon on the field by 1 stage.

spiritshackle.name: 缝影
spiritshackle.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.

entrainment.shortDesc: 目标的特性将会变得和使用者相同。
entrainment.name: 找伙伴
entrainment.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become the same as the user's. Fails if the target's Ability is Multitype, Stance Change, Truant, or the same Ability as the user, or if the user's Ability is Flower Gift, Forecast, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Stance Change, Trace, or Zen Mode.

wildcharge.name: 疯狂伏特
wildcharge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

razorleaf.shortDesc: 容易击中要害。攻击邻近的对手
razorleaf.name: 飞叶快刀
razorleaf.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

extremeevoboost.shortDesc: 提升使用者的攻击防御特攻特防速度各两级。
extremeevoboost.name: 九彩升华齐聚顶
extremeevoboost.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages.

mistball.name: 薄雾球
mistball.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.

beatup.shortDesc: 所有健康的己方宝可梦会一起攻击目标。
beatup.desc: Hits one time for the user and one time for each unfainted Pokemon without a major status condition in the user's party. The power of each hit is equal to 5+(X/10), where X is each participating Pokemon's base Attack; each hit is considered to come from the user.
beatup.name: 围攻

smokescreen.shortDesc: 使目标的命中率下降一级。
smokescreen.name: 烟幕
smokescreen.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

doubleslap.name: 连环巴掌
doubleslap.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

acupressure.shortDesc: 使自身或伙伴随机一项能力提升2级。
acupressure.name: 点穴
acupressure.desc: Raises a random stat by 2 stages as long as the stat is not already at stage 6. The user can choose to use this move on itself or an adjacent ally. Fails if no stat stage can be raised or if used on an ally with a substitute.

flamecharge.name: 蓄能焰袭
flamecharge.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.

machpunch.shortDesc: 一定能先发制人进行攻击。
machpunch.name: 音速拳

ember.shortDesc: 有10%的几率使目标陷入烧伤状态。
ember.name: 火花
ember.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

tailslap.name: 扫尾拍打
tailslap.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

lightscreen.shortDesc: 5回合内，对同伴的特殊攻击伤害减半。
lightscreen.name: 光墙
lightscreen.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double or Triple Battle. Critical hits ignore this protection. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay.

prismaticlaser.shortDesc: 使用者下回合无法移动
prismaticlaser.name: 棱镜镭射
prismaticlaser.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.

furyswipes.name: 乱抓
furyswipes.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

voltswitch.shortDesc: 使用者在攻击目标后会替换后备精灵上场。
voltswitch.name: 伏特替换
voltswitch.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button.

honeclaws.shortDesc: 使使用者的攻击和命中率上升一级。
honeclaws.name: 磨爪
honeclaws.desc: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1 stage.

twineedle.shortDesc: 攻击两次，每一次都有20%的几率使对手中毒。
twineedle.name: 双针
twineedle.desc: Hits twice, with each hit having a 20% chance to poison the target. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

lastresort.shortDesc: 只有所有习得的其他技能被时出示才能使用该技能。
lastresort.name: 珍藏
lastresort.desc: This move fails unless the user knows this move and at least one other move, and has used all the other moves it knows at least once each since it became active or Transformed.

waterspout.shortDesc: 使用者的HP剩下的越少，威力越小，攻击（所有）对手。
waterspout.name: 喷水
waterspout.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.

spark.shortDesc: 有30%的几率使对手陷入麻痹状态。
spark.name: 电光
spark.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

steameruption.name: 蒸汽爆炸
steameruption.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.

howl.shortDesc: 使使用者的攻击上升一级。
howl.name: 长嚎
howl.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.

attackorder.name: 攻击指令
attackorder.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

smog.name: 浊雾
smog.desc: Has a 40% chance to poison the target.

zenheadbutt.name: 意念头锤
zenheadbutt.desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target.

lowkick.name: 踢倒
lowkick.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its weight. Power is 20 if less than 10kg, 40 if less than 25kg, 60 if less than 50kg, 80 if less than 100kg, 100 if less than 200kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200kg.

naturepower.shortDesc: 攻击随着场地变化而变化。默认为三角攻击。
naturepower.name: 自然之力
naturepower.desc: This move calls another move for use based on the battle terrain. Tri Attack on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, Thunderbolt during Electric Terrain, Moonblast during Misty Terrain, Energy Ball during Grassy Terrain, and Psychic during Psychic Terrain.

fissure.shortDesc: 一击必杀。如果使用者的等级低于目标则使用技能失败。
fissure.name: 地裂
fissure.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Ability Sturdy are immune.

gust.shortDesc: 如果目标正使用飞空，弹跳，自由落体，技能威力翻倍。
gust.name: 起风
gust.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop.

twister.name: 龙卷风
twister.desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target. Damage doubles if the target is using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop.

gigaimpact.shortDesc: 使用者下回合无法移动
gigaimpact.name: 终极冲击
gigaimpact.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.

skullbash.shortDesc: 第一回合提升一级防御，第二回合攻击。
skullbash.name: 火箭头锤
skullbash.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage on the first turn. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

dynamicpunch.name: 爆裂拳
dynamicpunch.desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

magiccoat.name: 魔法反射
magiccoat.desc: Until the end of the turn, the user is unaffected by certain non-damaging moves directed at it and will instead use such moves against the original user. Moves reflected in this way are unable to be reflected again by this or the Ability Magic Bounce's effect. Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, and Toxic Spikes can only be reflected once per side, by the leftmost Pokemon under this or the Ability Magic Bounce's effect. If the user has the Ability Soundproof, this move's effect happens before a sound-based move can be nullified. The Abilities Lightning Rod and Storm Drain redirect their respective moves before this move takes effect.

headsmash.name: 双刃头锤
headsmash.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

autotomize.shortDesc: 使用者体重减少100KG，速度提升两级。
autotomize.name: 身体轻量化
autotomize.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages. If the user's Speed was changed, the user's weight is reduced by 100kg as long as it remains active. This effect is stackable but cannot reduce the user's weight to less than 0.1kg.

technoblast.shortDesc: 属性取决于所携带的卡带。
technoblast.name: 高科技光炮
technoblast.desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Drive.

blizzard.name: 暴风雪
blizzard.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. If the weather is Hail, this move does not check accuracy.

spotlight.shortDesc: Moves redirect to the target on the turn used.
spotlight.name: 聚光灯
spotlight.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from other Pokemon are redirected to the target. Such attacks are redirected to the target before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Ability Magic Bounce, or drawn in by the Abilities Lightning Rod or Storm Drain. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royale.

firepledge.shortDesc: 和草或水之誓言同时使用会有特效。
firepledge.name: 火之誓约
firepledge.desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Grass Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Grass Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 Base Power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Water Pledge with 150 Base Power and a rainbow appears on the user's side for 4 turns, which doubles secondary effect chances but does not stack with the Ability Serene Grace. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Fire Gem.

rockblast.name: 岩石爆击
rockblast.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

psychic.shortDesc: 有10%的几率使目标的特防下降一级。
psychic.name: 精神强念
psychic.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

finalgambit.shortDesc: 造成的伤害和使用者留下的HP相同。使用者陷入濒死状态。
finalgambit.name: 搏命
finalgambit.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's current HP. If this move is successful, the user faints.

afteryou.shortDesc: 目标将会在使用者之后立刻行动
afteryou.name: 您先请
afteryou.desc: The target makes its move immediately after the user this turn, no matter the priority of its selected move. Fails if the target would have moved next anyway, or if the target already moved this turn.

magneticflux.shortDesc: 提升具有正电/负电特性宝可梦的防御和特防一级。
magneticflux.name: 磁场操控
magneticflux.desc: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of Pokemon on the user's side with the Abilities Plus or Minus by 1 stage.

headcharge.name: 爆炸头撞击
headcharge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

barrage.name: 投球
barrage.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

reversal.shortDesc: 使用者的HP越少，技能威力越高。
reversal.name: 起死回生
reversal.desc: Deals damage to the target based on the amount of HP the user has left. X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down; the base power of this attack is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1.

sheercold.shortDesc: OHKOs a non-Ice target. Fails if user is a lower level.
sheercold.name: 绝对零度
sheercold.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with Ice typing or with the Ability Sturdy are immune.

spikes.shortDesc: 伤害交换出的站在地面上的对手，最多累积三次撒菱。
spikes.name: 撒菱
spikes.desc: Sets up a hazard on the foe's side of the field, damaging each foe that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Ability Levitate. Can be used up to three times before failing. Foes lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the foe's side if any foe uses Rapid Spin or Defog, or is hit by Defog.

thousandarrows.shortDesc: 击落周围的宝可梦，第一击可以击中飞行属性宝可梦。
thousandarrows.name: 千箭齐发
thousandarrows.desc: This move can hit airborne Pokemon, which includes Flying-type Pokemon, Pokemon with the Ability Levitate, Pokemon holding an Air Balloon, and Pokemon under the effect of Magnet Rise or Telekinesis. If the target is a Flying type and is not already grounded, this move deals neutral damage regardless of its other type(s). This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop. If this move hits a target under the effect of Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, or Telekinesis, the effect ends. If the target is a Flying type that has not used Roost this turn or a Pokemon with the Ability Levitate, it loses its immunity to Ground-type attacks and the Ability Arena Trap as long as it remains active. During the effect, Magnet Rise fails for the target and Telekinesis fails against the target.

aurorabeam.shortDesc: 有10%的几率使对手的攻击下降一级。
aurorabeam.name: 极光束
aurorabeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.

stringshot.shortDesc: 降低（所有）对手的速度2级。
stringshot.name: 吐丝
stringshot.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

nightmare.shortDesc: 睡眠中的目标每回合失去其最大HP的1/4。
nightmare.name: 恶梦
nightmare.desc: Causes the target to lose 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn as long as it is asleep. This move does not affect the target unless it is asleep. The effect ends when the target wakes up, even if it falls asleep again in the same turn.

seismictoss.shortDesc: 技能伤害和使用者的等级相同。
seismictoss.name: 地球上投
seismictoss.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.

stormthrow.name: 山岚摔
stormthrow.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Abilities Battle Armor or Shell Armor.

calmmind.shortDesc: 提升使用者的特攻和特防各一级。
calmmind.name: 冥想
calmmind.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.

imprison.shortDesc: 对手将无法使用使用者已习得的技能。
imprison.name: 封印
imprison.desc: The user prevents all of its foes from using any moves that the user also knows as long as the user remains active.

partingshot.shortDesc: 降低目标的攻击和特攻一级，使用者和后备精灵替换。
partingshot.name: 抛下狠话
partingshot.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If this move is successful, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members.

slackoff.shortDesc: 使使用者回复自身最大HP的50%。
slackoff.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
slackoff.name: 偷懒

strugglebug.shortDesc: 100%使(所有)对手的特攻下降一级。
strugglebug.name: 虫之抵抗
strugglebug.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.

waterpledge.shortDesc: 和草或火之誓言同时使用会有特效。
waterpledge.name: 水之誓约
waterpledge.desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Fire Pledge or Grass Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Fire Pledge, the ally uses Water Pledge with 150 Base Power and a rainbow appears on the user's side for 4 turns, which doubles secondary effect chances but does not stack with the Ability Serene Grace. If combined with Grass Pledge, the ally uses Grass Pledge with 150 Base Power and a swamp appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which quarters the Speed of each Pokemon on that side. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Water Gem, and cannot be redirected by the Ability Storm Drain.

feint.shortDesc: 实施对手的见切，保护，和快速/广域防守。
feint.name: 佯攻
feint.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.

dazzlinggleam.shortDesc: 攻击对手造成伤害。攻击邻近的宝可梦。
dazzlinggleam.name: 魔法闪耀

geargrind.name: 齿轮飞盘
geargrind.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

growl.shortDesc: 使（所有）对手的攻击下降一级。
growl.name: 叫声
growl.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.

hurricane.shortDesc: 30%使目标陷入混乱状态，在雨天不能被回避。
hurricane.name: 暴风
hurricane.desc: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop. If the weather is Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%.

acrobatics.shortDesc: 在使用者不持有道具的时候给予双倍伤害。
acrobatics.name: 杂技
acrobatics.desc: Power doubles if the user has no held item.

smackdown.shortDesc: 消除对手对地上属性的免疫力。
smackdown.name: 击落
smackdown.desc: This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop. If this move hits a target under the effect of Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, or Telekinesis, the effect ends. If the target is a Flying type that has not used Roost this turn or a Pokemon with the Ability Levitate, it loses its immunity to Ground-type attacks and the Ability Arena Trap as long as it remains active. During the effect, Magnet Rise fails for the target and Telekinesis fails against the target.

watershuriken.name: 飞水手里剑
watershuriken.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times. Base power is 20 if the user is Ash-Greninja.

sacredfire.shortDesc: 50%使目标陷入烧伤状态。能使使用者解除冰冻状态。
sacredfire.name: 神圣之火
sacredfire.desc: Has a 50% chance to burn the target.

eruption.shortDesc: 使用者的HP剩下的越少，威力越小，攻击（所有）对手。
eruption.name: 喷火
eruption.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.

hyperspacehole.shortDesc: 这一回合能够破坏对手的守住状态。
hyperspacehole.name: 异次元洞
hyperspacehole.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.

confuseray.name: 奇异之光
confuseray.desc: Causes the target to become confused.

trick.shortDesc: 使用者和目标交换道具。
trick.name: 戏法
trick.desc: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, or a Drive to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, or a Genesect, respectively. Pokemon with the Ability Sticky Hold are immune.

skillswap.shortDesc: 使用者和目标交换特性。
skillswap.name: 特性互换
skillswap.desc: The user swaps its Ability with the target's Ability. Fails if either the user or the target's Ability is Illusion, Multitype, Stance Change, or Wonder Guard, but does not fail if both have the same Ability.

flamewheel.shortDesc: 10%使目标陷入烧伤状态。能使使用者解除冰冻状态。
flamewheel.name: 火焰轮
flamewheel.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

bugbite.shortDesc: 使用者将窃取并食用目标的树果。
bugbite.name: 虫咬
bugbite.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Ability Harvest.

fly.shortDesc: 第一回合上天，第二回合攻击。
fly.name: 飞翔
fly.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

boltstrike.shortDesc: 有20%的几率使对手陷入麻痹状态。
boltstrike.name: 雷击
boltstrike.desc: Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target.

heatcrash.shortDesc: 使用者比目标越重，技能威力越大。
heatcrash.name: 高温重压
heatcrash.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.

airslash.shortDesc: 有30%的几率使目标陷入畏缩状态。
airslash.name: 空气斩
airslash.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

ingrain.shortDesc: 使用者每回合回复最大HP的1/16，但将无法替换。
ingrain.name: 扎根
ingrain.desc: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP restored at the end of each turn, but it is prevented from switching out and other Pokemon cannot force the user to switch out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped and still receive the healing effect. During the effect, the user can be hit normally by Ground-type attacks and be affected by Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and Sticky Web, even if the user is a Flying type or has the Ability Levitate.

skydrop.shortDesc: 使用者和对手第一回合一起上天，第二回合给对手造成伤害。
skydrop.name: 自由落体
skydrop.desc: This attack takes the target into the air with the user on the first turn and executes on the second. Pokemon weighing 200kg or more cannot be lifted. On the first turn, the user and the target avoid all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister. The user and the target cannot make a move between turns, but the target can select a move to use. This move cannot damage Flying-type Pokemon. Fails on the first turn if the target is an ally or if the target has a substitute.

revelationdance.shortDesc: 此招式的属性将变得和自己的第二属性相同。
revelationdance.name: 觉醒之舞
revelationdance.desc: This move's type depends on the user's primary type.

whirlpool.name: 潮旋
whirlpool.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns; seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.

thundershock.name: 电击
thundershock.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

coil.shortDesc: 提升使用者的攻击防御命中率各一级。
coil.name: 盘蜷
coil.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by 1 stage.

tailwhip.shortDesc: 使（所有）对手的防御下降一级。
tailwhip.name: 摇尾巴
tailwhip.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.

toxicspikes.shortDesc: 使替换上场的对手中毒，最多累积2次
toxicspikes.name: 毒菱
toxicspikes.desc: Sets up a hazard on the foe's side of the field, poisoning each foe that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Ability Levitate. Can be used up to two times before failing. Foes become poisoned with one layer and badly poisoned with two layers. Can be removed from the foe's side if any foe uses Rapid Spin or Defog, is hit by Defog, or a grounded Poison-type Pokemon switches in. Safeguard prevents the foe's party from being poisoned on switch-in, but a substitute does not.

heavyslam.shortDesc: 使用者比目标越重，技能威力越大。
heavyslam.name: 重磅冲撞
heavyslam.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less.

boneclub.name: 骨棒
boneclub.desc: Has a 10% chance to flinch the target.

armthrust.name: 猛推
armthrust.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

superfang.shortDesc: 攻击造成的伤害为目标剩下HP的50%。
superfang.name: 愤怒门牙
superfang.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.

worryseed.name: 烦恼种子
worryseed.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become Insomnia. Fails if the target's Ability is Insomnia, Multitype, Stance Change, or Truant.

torment.shortDesc: 目标不能连续使用同一技能。
torment.name: 无理取闹
torment.desc: Prevents the target from selecting the same move for use two turns in a row. This effect lasts until the target leaves the field.

vitalthrow.shortDesc: 技能一定会命中，最后行动。
vitalthrow.name: 借力摔
vitalthrow.desc: This move does not check accuracy.

rocksmash.shortDesc: 有50%的几率使对手的防御下降一级。
rocksmash.name: 碎岩
rocksmash.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

lick.shortDesc: 有30%的几率使对手陷入麻痹状态。
lick.name: 舌舔
lick.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

psyshock.shortDesc: 计算伤害时按防守方的防御计算，不是特防。
psyshock.name: 精神冲击
psyshock.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.

poisonsting.name: 毒针
poisonsting.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

lightthatburnsthesky.shortDesc: Uses higher attacking stat for DMG. Ignores ability.
lightthatburnsthesky.name: 焚天灭世炽光爆
lightthatburnsthesky.desc: Damage is calculated using the user's higher attacking stat, including stat stage changes. The user's Ability, item, and burn are used as normal.

swift.shortDesc: 攻击一定会命中。攻击所有对手。
swift.name: 高速星星
swift.desc: This move does not check accuracy.

sleeptalk.shortDesc: 使用者必须处于睡眠状态。使用一个已习得的技能。
sleeptalk.name: 梦话
sleeptalk.desc: One of the user's known moves, besides this move, is selected for use at random. Fails if the user is not asleep. The selected move does not have PP deducted from it, and can currently have 0 PP. This move cannot select Assist, Belch, Bide, Chatter, Copycat, Focus Punch, Hold Hands, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Uproar, or any two-turn move.

mindblown.shortDesc: 使用者损失最大HP的50%，攻击周围全体宝可梦。
mindblown.name: 惊爆大头
mindblown.desc: The user loses 50% of its max HP to damage the foe.

doublekick.name: 二连踢
doublekick.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

spikyshield.shortDesc: 保护自己免受技能影响，接触到的对手会损失最大HP的1/8。
spikyshield.name: 尖刺防守
spikyshield.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon making contact with the user lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

psychoshift.shortDesc: 将使用者的负面状态转移给对手。
psychoshift.name: 精神转移
psychoshift.desc: The user's major status condition is transferred to the target, and the user is then cured. Fails if the target already has a major status condition.

darkvoid.name: 暗黑洞
darkvoid.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

stoneedge.name: 尖石攻击
stoneedge.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

venoshock.shortDesc: 如果对手已经中毒，技能威力翻倍
venoshock.name: 毒液冲击
venoshock.desc: Power doubles if the target is poisoned.

endure.shortDesc: 使用者在下次的攻击之后至少会留下一点HP。
endure.name: 挺住
endure.desc: The user will survive attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn with at least 1 HP. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

sonicboom.name: 音爆
sonicboom.desc: Deals 20 HP of damage to the target.

zapcannon.name: 电磁炮
zapcannon.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

sludgewave.name: 污泥波
sludgewave.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

wideguard.shortDesc: Protects allies from multi-target hits this turn.
wideguard.name: 广域防守
wideguard.desc: The user and its party members are protected from damaging attacks made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn that target all adjacent foes or all adjacent Pokemon. This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.

doubleteam.shortDesc: 使使用者的回避率上升以一级。
doubleteam.name: 影子分身
doubleteam.desc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1 stage.

defensecurl.shortDesc: 使使用者的防御提升一级。
defensecurl.name: 变圆
defensecurl.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage. As long as the user remains active, the power of the user's Ice Ball and Rollout will be doubled (this effect is not stackable).

ironhead.shortDesc: 有30%的几率使目标陷入畏缩状态。
ironhead.name: 铁头
ironhead.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target.

aquajet.shortDesc: 一定能先发制人进行攻击。
aquajet.name: 水流喷射

knockoff.shortDesc: 如果目标持有道具的话，技能威力为原来的1.5倍。封住目标的道具。
knockoff.name: 拍落
knockoff.desc: If the target is holding an item that can be removed from it, ignoring the Ability Sticky Hold, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. If the user has not fainted, the target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Ability Sticky Hold to lose their held item, cause Pokemon that can Mega Evolve to lose the Mega Stone for their species, or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, or a Genesect to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, or Drive, respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Ability Harvest.

sandstorm.name: 沙暴
sandstorm.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sandstorm. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are a Ground, Rock, or Steel type, or have the Abilities Magic Guard, Overcoat, Sand Force, Sand Rush, or Sand Veil. The Special Defense of Rock-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a special attack during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Smooth Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sandstorm.

sludgebomb.name: 污泥炸弹
sludgebomb.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

pollenpuff.shortDesc: 如果目标是同伴则恢复其最大HP的50%。
pollenpuff.name: 花粉团
pollenpuff.desc: If the target is an ally, this move restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down, instead of dealing damage.

blueflare.shortDesc: 有20%的几率使对手陷入烧伤状态。
blueflare.name: 青焰
blueflare.desc: Has a 20% chance to burn the target.

dragonrage.name: 龙之怒
dragonrage.desc: Deals 40 HP of damage to the target.

icefang.shortDesc: 10%使目标陷入冰冻状态。10%使目标畏缩。
icefang.name: 冰冻牙
icefang.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a 10% chance to flinch it.

furycutter.shortDesc: 每一连续击都会使上一击的威力加倍。最高为160。
furycutter.name: 连斩
furycutter.desc: Power doubles with each successful hit, up to a maximum of 160 power; power is reset if the move misses or another move is used.

poweruppunch.name: 增强拳
poweruppunch.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.

revenge.shortDesc: 如果被对手攻击的话，威力翻倍。
revenge.name: 报复
revenge.desc: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn.

gravity.shortDesc: 五回合内无视所有对地上属性的免疫。
gravity.name: 重力
gravity.desc: For 5 turns, the evasiveness of all active Pokemon is multiplied by 0.6. At the time of use, Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, and Telekinesis end immediately for all active Pokemon. During the effect, Bounce, Fly, Flying Press, High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, Splash, and Telekinesis are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. Ground-type attacks, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Ability Arena Trap can affect Flying types or Pokemon with the Ability Levitate. Fails if this move is already in effect.

flash.shortDesc: 使目标的命中率下降一级。
flash.name: 闪光
flash.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

tickle.shortDesc: 使目标的攻击和防御下降一级。
tickle.name: 挠痒
tickle.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.

tailwind.shortDesc: 四回合内同伴的速度翻倍。
tailwind.name: 顺风
tailwind.desc: For 4 turns, the user and its party members have their Speed doubled. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's side.

roar.shortDesc: 使目标和后备精灵替换。
roar.name: 吼叫
roar.desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Ability Suction Cups.

substitute.shortDesc: 使用者损失最大HP的25%来制造一个替身。
substitute.name: 替身
substitute.desc: The user takes 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, and puts it into a substitute to take its place in battle. The substitute is removed once enough damage is inflicted on it, or if the user switches out or faints. Baton Pass can be used to transfer the substitute to an ally, and the substitute will keep its remaining HP. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat stage changes caused by other Pokemon. Sound-based moves and Pokemon with the Ability Infiltrator ignore substitutes. The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is partially trapped, the partial-trapping effect ends immediately. This move fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute, or if it already has a substitute.

dive.shortDesc: 第一回合潜入水中，第二回合攻击。
dive.name: 潜水
dive.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Surf and Whirlpool but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

bulletseed.name: 种子机关枪
bulletseed.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 1/3 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/6 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Ability Skill Link, this move will always hit five times.

cottonspore.shortDesc: 使目标的速度下降两级
cottonspore.name: 棉孢子
cottonspore.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

irontail.name: 铁尾
irontail.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

powersplit.shortDesc: 和目标平分攻击和特攻。
powersplit.name: 力量平分
powersplit.desc: The user and the target have their Attack and Special Attack stats set to be equal to the average of the user and the target's Attack and Special Attack stats, respectively, rounded down. Stat stage changes are unaffected.

stickyweb.shortDesc: 降低对手替换出的站在地面上的宝可梦的速度一级。
stickyweb.name: 黏黏网
stickyweb.desc: Sets up a hazard on the foe's side of the field, lowering the Speed by 1 stage of each foe that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Ability Levitate. Can be used only once before failing. Can be removed from the foe's side if any foe uses Rapid Spin or Defog, or is hit by Defog.

confide.shortDesc: 使目标的特攻下降一级。
confide.name: 密语
confide.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.

dragonrush.name: 龙之俯冲
dragonrush.desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
